Garlic<Deli>O pills<Deli>O may<Deli>O not<Deli>O lower<Deli>O blood<Deli>O cholesterol<Deli>O and<Deli>O studies<Deli>O that<Deli>O show<Deli>O they<Deli>O do<Deli>O may<Deli>O be<Deli>O flawed<Deli>O ,<Deli>O British<Deli>I-MISC researchers<Deli>O have<Deli>O reported<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
A<Deli>O study<Deli>O by<Deli>O a<Deli>O team<Deli>O of<Deli>O doctors<Deli>O at<Deli>O Oxford<Deli>I-ORG University<Deli>I-ORG has<Deli>O found<Deli>O people<Deli>O with<Deli>O high<Deli>O blood<Deli>O cholesterol<Deli>O do<Deli>O not<Deli>O benefit<Deli>O significantly<Deli>O from<Deli>O taking<Deli>O garlic<Deli>O tablets<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
The<Deli>O study<Deli>O involved<Deli>O 115<Deli>O people<Deli>O with<Deli>O high<Deli>O blood<Deli>O cholesterol<Deli>O levels<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
They<Deli>O were<Deli>O given<Deli>O 900<Deli>O milligrams<Deli>O a<Deli>O day<Deli>O of<Deli>O dried<Deli>O garlic<Deli>O powder<Deli>O or<Deli>O placebo<Deli>O tablets<Deli>O .<Deli>O "<Deli>O 
There<Deli>O were<Deli>O no<Deli>O significant<Deli>O differences<Deli>O between<Deli>O the<Deli>O groups<Deli>O receiving<Deli>O garlic<Deli>O and<Deli>O placebo<Deli>O ,<Deli>O "<Deli>O they<Deli>O wrote<Deli>O in<Deli>O the<Deli>O Journal<Deli>I-ORG of<Deli>I-ORG the<Deli>I-ORG Royal<Deli>I-ORG College<Deli>I-ORG of<Deli>I-ORG Physicians<Deli>I-ORG .<Deli>O 
Those<Deli>O taking<Deli>O part<Deli>O were<Deli>O told<Deli>O to<Deli>O eat<Deli>O a<Deli>O low-fat<Deli>O diet<Deli>O for<Deli>O six<Deli>O weeks<Deli>O before<Deli>O they<Deli>O started<Deli>O taking<Deli>O the<Deli>O pills<Deli>O ,<Deli>O and<Deli>O their<Deli>O blood<Deli>O cholesterol<Deli>O measured<Deli>O before<Deli>O and<Deli>O after<Deli>O the<Deli>O six-week<Deli>O period<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
The<Deli>O researchers<Deli>O said<Deli>O this<Deli>O would<Deli>O make<Deli>O their<Deli>O findings<Deli>O more<Deli>O accurate<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Several<Deli>O studies<Deli>O have<Deli>O found<Deli>O garlic<Deli>O pills<Deli>O can<Deli>O lower<Deli>O blood<Deli>O pressure<Deli>O and<Deli>O blood<Deli>O cholesterol<Deli>O .<Deli>O

Westlake<Deli>I-PER ,<Deli>O arrested<Deli>O in<Deli>O December<Deli>O 1993<Deli>O and<Deli>O charged<Deli>O with<Deli>O heroin<Deli>O trafficking<Deli>O ,<Deli>O sawed<Deli>O the<Deli>O iron<Deli>O grill<Deli>O off<Deli>O his<Deli>O cell<Deli>O window<Deli>O and<Deli>O climbed<Deli>O down<Deli>O the<Deli>O prison<Deli>O 's<Deli>O five-metre<Deli>O (<Deli>O 15-foot<Deli>O )<Deli>O wall<Deli>O on<Deli>O a<Deli>O rope<Deli>O made<Deli>O from<Deli>O bed<Deli>O sheets<Deli>O ,<Deli>O Vivit<Deli>O said<Deli>O .<Deli>O

Malaysia<Deli>I-LOC has<Deli>O banned<Deli>O the<Deli>O use<Deli>O of<Deli>O nitrofuran<Deli>O ,<Deli>O an<Deli>O antibiotic<Deli>O ,<Deli>O in<Deli>O chicken<Deli>O feed<Deli>O and<Deli>O veterinary<Deli>O applications<Deli>O because<Deli>O it<Deli>O believes<Deli>O the<Deli>O drug<Deli>O could<Deli>O cause<Deli>O cancer<Deli>O ,<Deli>O the<Deli>O health<Deli>O ministry<Deli>O said<Deli>O on<Deli>O Thursday<Deli>O .<Deli>O

Ukraine<Deli>I-LOC hails<Deli>O peace<Deli>O as<Deli>O marks<Deli>O five-year<Deli>O independence<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Rostislav<Deli>I-PER Khotin<Deli>I-PER 
KIEV<Deli>I-LOC 1996-08-23<Deli>O 
Ukraine<Deli>I-LOC celebrates<Deli>O five<Deli>O years<Deli>O of<Deli>O independence<Deli>O from<Deli>O Kremlin<Deli>I-LOC rule<Deli>O on<Deli>O Saturday<Deli>O ,<Deli>O hailing<Deli>O civil<Deli>O and<Deli>O inter-ethnic<Deli>O peace<Deli>O as<Deli>O its<Deli>O main<Deli>O post-Soviet<Deli>I-MISC achievement<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Ukraine<Deli>I-LOC 's<Deli>O declaration<Deli>O of<Deli>O independence<Deli>O in<Deli>O 1991<Deli>O ,<Deli>O backed<Deli>O nine-to-one<Deli>O by<Deli>O a<Deli>O referendum<Deli>O in<Deli>O December<Deli>O of<Deli>O that<Deli>O year<Deli>O ,<Deli>O effectively<Deli>O dealt<Deli>O a<Deli>O death<Deli>O blow<Deli>O to<Deli>O the<Deli>O Soviet<Deli>I-MISC empire<Deli>O and<Deli>O ended<Deli>O more<Deli>O than<Deli>O three<Deli>O centuries<Deli>O of<Deli>O rule<Deli>O from<Deli>O Moscow<Deli>I-LOC .<Deli>O 
Ukraine<Deli>I-LOC ,<Deli>O with<Deli>O a<Deli>O Russian<Deli>I-MISC community<Deli>O of<Deli>O 11<Deli>O million<Deli>O people<Deli>O --<Deli>O the<Deli>O world<Deli>O 's<Deli>O largest<Deli>O outside<Deli>O Russia<Deli>I-LOC --<Deli>O has<Deli>O avoided<Deli>O conflicts<Deli>O like<Deli>O those<Deli>O in<Deli>O Russia<Deli>I-LOC 's<Deli>O Chechnya<Deli>I-LOC ,<Deli>O neighbouring<Deli>O Moldova<Deli>I-LOC ,<Deli>O and<Deli>O the<Deli>O former<Deli>O Soviet<Deli>I-MISC republics<Deli>O of<Deli>O Georgia<Deli>I-LOC ,<Deli>O Azerbaijan<Deli>I-LOC and<Deli>O Tajikistan<Deli>I-LOC .<Deli>O 
"<Deli>O Ukraine<Deli>I-LOC 's<Deli>O biggest<Deli>O achievements<Deli>O for<Deli>O five<Deli>O years<Deli>O are<Deli>O the<Deli>O preservation<Deli>O of<Deli>O civil<Deli>O peace<Deli>O and<Deli>O inter-ethnic<Deli>O harmony<Deli>O ,<Deli>O "<Deli>O President<Deli>O Leonid<Deli>I-PER Kuchma<Deli>I-PER said<Deli>O in<Deli>O televised<Deli>O statement<Deli>O this<Deli>O week<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
"<Deli>O Unlike<Deli>O many<Deli>O other<Deli>O post-Soviet<Deli>I-MISC countries<Deli>O we<Deli>O were<Deli>O able<Deli>O to<Deli>O deal<Deli>O with<Deli>O conflict<Deli>O situations<Deli>O in<Deli>O a<Deli>O peaceful<Deli>O and<Deli>O civilised<Deli>O way<Deli>O .<Deli>O "<Deli>O 
But<Deli>O independence<Deli>O was<Deli>O initially<Deli>O accompanied<Deli>O by<Deli>O hyper-inflation<Deli>O and<Deli>O economic<Deli>O collapse<Deli>O ,<Deli>O although<Deli>O there<Deli>O are<Deli>O signs<Deli>O of<Deli>O a<Deli>O turnaround<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Inflation<Deli>O --<Deli>O a<Deli>O hyper-inflationary<Deli>O 10,300<Deli>O percent<Deli>O a<Deli>O year<Deli>O in<Deli>O 1993<Deli>O --<Deli>O was<Deli>O a<Deli>O respectable<Deli>O 0.1<Deli>O percent<Deli>O a<Deli>O month<Deli>O in<Deli>O June<Deli>O and<Deli>O July<Deli>O and<Deli>O the<Deli>O economy<Deli>O has<Deli>O just<Deli>O begun<Deli>O to<Deli>O grow<Deli>O .<Deli>O

TAIBE<Deli>I-LOC ,<Deli>O Israel<Deli>I-LOC 1996-08-23<Deli>O

LONDON<Deli>I-LOC 1996-08-24<Deli>O 
A<Deli>O British<Deli>I-MISC aid<Deli>O worker<Deli>O ,<Deli>O held<Deli>O hostage<Deli>O in<Deli>O Chechnya<Deli>I-LOC for<Deli>O nearly<Deli>O four<Deli>O weeks<Deli>O ,<Deli>O said<Deli>O on<Deli>O Saturday<Deli>O a<Deli>O cocked<Deli>O Kalashnikov<Deli>I-MISC had<Deli>O been<Deli>O thrust<Deli>O into<Deli>O his<Deli>O mouth<Deli>O at<Deli>O one<Deli>O point<Deli>O during<Deli>O his<Deli>O ordeal<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Michael<Deli>I-PER Penrose<Deli>I-PER ,<Deli>O a<Deli>O 23-year-old<Deli>O worker<Deli>O with<Deli>O the<Deli>O group<Deli>O Action<Deli>I-ORG Against<Deli>I-ORG Hunger<Deli>I-ORG ,<Deli>O described<Deli>O his<Deli>O ordeal<Deli>O to<Deli>O a<Deli>O news<Deli>O conference<Deli>O when<Deli>O he<Deli>O arrived<Deli>O back<Deli>O in<Deli>O Britain<Deli>I-LOC from<Deli>O Moscow<Deli>I-LOC .<Deli>O 
"<Deli>O The<Deli>O worst<Deli>O period<Deli>O of<Deli>O physical<Deli>O manhandling<Deli>O was<Deli>O during<Deli>O that<Deli>O time<Deli>O when<Deli>O we<Deli>O were<Deli>O beaten<Deli>O with<Deli>O Kalashnikovs<Deli>I-MISC and<Deli>O at<Deli>O one<Deli>O point<Deli>O I<Deli>O had<Deli>O a<Deli>O Kalashnikov<Deli>I-MISC held<Deli>O to<Deli>O the<Deli>O back<Deli>O of<Deli>O my<Deli>O throat<Deli>O --<Deli>O cocked<Deli>O ,<Deli>O "<Deli>O he<Deli>O said<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
"<Deli>O For<Deli>O the<Deli>O first<Deli>O period<Deli>O we<Deli>O were<Deli>O held<Deli>O in<Deli>O a<Deli>O small<Deli>O room<Deli>O with<Deli>O no<Deli>O bed<Deli>O or<Deli>O anything<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
We<Deli>O had<Deli>O very<Deli>O little<Deli>O food<Deli>O and<Deli>O sometimes<Deli>O went<Deli>O two<Deli>O or<Deli>O three<Deli>O days<Deli>O without<Deli>O eating<Deli>O .<Deli>O "<Deli>O 
Gunmen<Deli>O seized<Deli>O Penrose<Deli>I-PER ,<Deli>O who<Deli>O comes<Deli>O from<Deli>O Swerford<Deli>I-LOC in<Deli>O southern<Deli>O England<Deli>I-LOC ,<Deli>O Frenchman<Deli>I-MISC Frederic<Deli>I-PER Malardeau<Deli>I-PER and<Deli>O six<Deli>O other<Deli>O hostages<Deli>O from<Deli>O their<Deli>O car<Deli>O in<Deli>O Grozny<Deli>I-LOC ,<Deli>O the<Deli>O capital<Deli>O of<Deli>O Chechnya<Deli>I-LOC ,<Deli>O on<Deli>O July<Deli>O 27<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
The<Deli>O assailants<Deli>O had<Deli>O demanded<Deli>O a<Deli>O ransom<Deli>O of<Deli>O 300,000<Deli>O pounds<Deli>O (<Deli>O $<Deli>O 465,000<Deli>O )<Deli>O but<Deli>O no<Deli>O money<Deli>O was<Deli>O paid<Deli>O by<Deli>O the<Deli>O charity<Deli>O when<Deli>O they<Deli>O were<Deli>O released<Deli>O on<Deli>O Wednesday<Deli>O .<Deli>O

"<Deli>O During<Deli>O the<Deli>O last<Deli>O 15<Deli>O days<Deli>O of<Deli>O being<Deli>O held<Deli>O ,<Deli>O the<Deli>O fighting<Deli>O in<Deli>O Grozny<Deli>I-LOC was<Deli>O very<Deli>O close<Deli>O .<Deli>O

PEMBERTON<Deli>I-LOC ,<Deli>O British<Deli>I-LOC Columbia<Deli>I-LOC 1996-08-24<Deli>O 
About<Deli>O 350<Deli>O adventurers<Deli>O from<Deli>O nine<Deli>O countries<Deli>O set<Deli>O out<Deli>O on<Deli>O Saturday<Deli>O to<Deli>O climb<Deli>O ,<Deli>O raft<Deli>O ,<Deli>O bike<Deli>O and<Deli>O run<Deli>O in<Deli>O a<Deli>O 323-mile<Deli>O (<Deli>O 517-km<Deli>O )<Deli>O endurance<Deli>O race<Deli>O through<Deli>O the<Deli>O Canadian<Deli>I-MISC wilderness<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
The<Deli>O event<Deli>O ,<Deli>O called<Deli>O the<Deli>O Eco-Challenge<Deli>I-MISC ,<Deli>O is<Deli>O part<Deli>O of<Deli>O a<Deli>O growing<Deli>O sport<Deli>O known<Deli>O as<Deli>O adventure<Deli>O racing<Deli>O in<Deli>O which<Deli>O competitors<Deli>O test<Deli>O their<Deli>O limits<Deli>O for<Deli>O days<Deli>O over<Deli>O a<Deli>O perilous<Deli>O wilderness<Deli>O course<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
"<Deli>O I<Deli>O 'm<Deli>O looking<Deli>O forward<Deli>O to<Deli>O this<Deli>O race<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
I<Deli>O think<Deli>O it<Deli>O will<Deli>O be<Deli>O more<Deli>O physically<Deli>O challenging<Deli>O and<Deli>O we<Deli>O 'll<Deli>O have<Deli>O to<Deli>O go<Deli>O up<Deli>O against<Deli>O more<Deli>O diverse<Deli>O situations<Deli>O due<Deli>O to<Deli>O the<Deli>O terrain<Deli>O ,<Deli>O "<Deli>O said<Deli>O Dr.<Deli>O Michael<Deli>I-PER Stroud<Deli>I-PER ,<Deli>O a<Deli>O veteran<Deli>O Eco-Challenge<Deli>I-MISC participant<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
The<Deli>O Eco-Challenge<Deli>I-MISC has<Deli>O been<Deli>O staged<Deli>O twice<Deli>O before<Deli>O --<Deli>O in<Deli>O Utah<Deli>I-LOC and<Deli>O Maine<Deli>I-LOC last<Deli>O year<Deli>O --<Deli>O and<Deli>O is<Deli>O modelled<Deli>O on<Deli>O similar<Deli>O races<Deli>O overseas<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
The<Deli>O 70<Deli>O teams<Deli>O in<Deli>O this<Deli>O year<Deli>O 's<Deli>O race<Deli>O will<Deli>O will<Deli>O trek<Deli>O glaciers<Deli>O ,<Deli>O climb<Deli>O mountains<Deli>O ,<Deli>O whitewater<Deli>O raft<Deli>O ,<Deli>O horseback<Deli>O ride<Deli>O ,<Deli>O canoe<Deli>O and<Deli>O mountain<Deli>O bike<Deli>O along<Deli>O the<Deli>O grueling<Deli>O course<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
This<Deli>O year<Deli>O 's<Deli>O race<Deli>O ,<Deli>O the<Deli>O route<Deli>O of<Deli>O which<Deli>O was<Deli>O keep<Deli>O a<Deli>O secret<Deli>O until<Deli>O Friday<Deli>O evening<Deli>O ,<Deli>O is<Deli>O being<Deli>O held<Deli>O near<Deli>O Pemberton<Deli>I-LOC ,<Deli>O British<Deli>I-LOC Columbia<Deli>I-LOC ,<Deli>O about<Deli>O 100<Deli>O miles<Deli>O (<Deli>O 160<Deli>O km<Deli>O )<Deli>O northeast<Deli>O of<Deli>O Vancouver<Deli>I-LOC .<Deli>O 
The<Deli>O area<Deli>O is<Deli>O filled<Deli>O with<Deli>O treacherous<Deli>O mountain<Deli>O peaks<Deli>O ,<Deli>O ice<Deli>O fields<Deli>O and<Deli>O frigid<Deli>O waters<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Organisers<Deli>O expect<Deli>O about<Deli>O two-thirds<Deli>O of<Deli>O the<Deli>O participants<Deli>O to<Deli>O drop<Deli>O out<Deli>O or<Deli>O be<Deli>O disqualified<Deli>O before<Deli>O the<Deli>O finish<Deli>O .<Deli>O

The<Deli>O Public<Deli>I-ORG Service<Deli>I-ORG Commission<Deli>I-ORG (<Deli>O PSC<Deli>I-ORG )<Deli>O said<Deli>O in<Deli>O a<Deli>O statement<Deli>O that<Deli>O the<Deli>O workers<Deli>O --<Deli>O including<Deli>O nurses<Deli>O ,<Deli>O junior<Deli>O doctors<Deli>O ,<Deli>O mortuary<Deli>O attendants<Deli>O ,<Deli>O customs<Deli>O officers<Deli>O and<Deli>O firefighters<Deli>O --<Deli>O would<Deli>O be<Deli>O barred<Deli>O from<Deli>O entering<Deli>O their<Deli>O workplaces<Deli>O on<Deli>O Monday<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
"<Deli>O All<Deli>O civil<Deli>O servants<Deli>O who<Deli>O did<Deli>O not<Deli>O return<Deli>O to<Deli>O work<Deli>O at<Deli>O their<Deli>O normal<Deli>O working<Deli>O hours<Deli>O ,<Deli>O and<Deli>O remained<Deli>O working<Deli>O for<Deli>O the<Deli>O full<Deli>O working<Deli>O day<Deli>O on<Deli>O 23<Deli>O August<Deli>O 1996<Deli>O ,<Deli>O have<Deli>O been<Deli>O summarily<Deli>O dismissed<Deli>O ...<Deli>O 
with<Deli>O immediate<Deli>O effect<Deli>O ,<Deli>O "<Deli>O it<Deli>O said<Deli>O in<Deli>O a<Deli>O statement<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Union<Deli>O officials<Deli>O from<Deli>O the<Deli>O Public<Deli>I-ORG Service<Deli>I-ORG Association<Deli>I-ORG (<Deli>O PSA<Deli>I-ORG )<Deli>O were<Deli>O unavailable<Deli>O for<Deli>O comment<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Public<Deli>I-ORG Service<Deli>I-ORG ,<Deli>I-ORG Labour<Deli>I-ORG and<Deli>I-ORG Social<Deli>I-ORG Welfare<Deli>I-ORG Minister<Deli>O Florence<Deli>I-LOC Chitauro<Deli>O told<Deli>O state<Deli>O radio<Deli>O her<Deli>O ministry<Deli>O had<Deli>O already<Deli>O begun<Deli>O recruiting<Deli>O other<Deli>O people<Deli>O to<Deli>O replace<Deli>O the<Deli>O strikers<Deli>O ,<Deli>O sub-contracting<Deli>O some<Deli>O of<Deli>O the<Deli>O work<Deli>O to<Deli>O private<Deli>O firms<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
The<Deli>O government<Deli>O had<Deli>O been<Deli>O threatening<Deli>O to<Deli>O fire<Deli>O the<Deli>O workers<Deli>O since<Deli>O the<Deli>O strike<Deli>O began<Deli>O on<Deli>O Tuesday<Deli>O ,<Deli>O saying<Deli>O it<Deli>O was<Deli>O illegal<Deli>O .<Deli>O

King<Deli>O Birendra<Deli>I-PER ,<Deli>O in<Deli>O Tibet<Deli>I-LOC at<Deli>O the<Deli>O start<Deli>O of<Deli>O a<Deli>O one-week<Deli>O unofficial<Deli>O visit<Deli>O to<Deli>O China<Deli>I-LOC ,<Deli>O said<Deli>O the<Deli>O Nepalese<Deli>I-MISC government<Deli>O had<Deli>O "<Deli>O maintained<Deli>O a<Deli>O sharp<Deli>O vigilance<Deli>O against<Deli>O such<Deli>O intentions<Deli>O "<Deli>O ,<Deli>O the<Deli>O newspaper<Deli>O said<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Nepal<Deli>I-LOC shares<Deli>O a<Deli>O long<Deli>O mountain<Deli>O border<Deli>O with<Deli>O the<Deli>O restive<Deli>O Himalayan<Deli>I-MISC region<Deli>O ,<Deli>O where<Deli>O opposition<Deli>O to<Deli>O Beijing<Deli>I-LOC 's<Deli>O four-decade<Deli>O rule<Deli>O is<Deli>O widespread<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Chinese<Deli>I-MISC official<Deli>O media<Deli>O has<Deli>O often<Deli>O accused<Deli>O foreign<Deli>O forces<Deli>O ,<Deli>O notably<Deli>O the<Deli>O United<Deli>I-LOC States<Deli>I-LOC ,<Deli>O of<Deli>O seeking<Deli>O to<Deli>O support<Deli>O Tibetan<Deli>I-MISC independence<Deli>O activists<Deli>O .<Deli>O

TEHRAN<Deli>I-LOC 1996-08-24<Deli>O 
Iran<Deli>I-LOC has<Deli>O hanged<Deli>O two<Deli>O drug<Deli>O traffickers<Deli>O in<Deli>O the<Deli>O southern<Deli>O city<Deli>O of<Deli>O Shiraz<Deli>I-LOC ,<Deli>O the<Deli>O evening<Deli>O newspaper<Deli>O Resalat<Deli>I-ORG reported<Deli>O on<Deli>O Saturday<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
The<Deli>O two<Deli>O Iranian<Deli>I-MISC men<Deli>O were<Deli>O arrested<Deli>O in<Deli>O July<Deli>O with<Deli>O 419<Deli>O kilograms<Deli>O (<Deli>O 924<Deli>O lbs<Deli>O )<Deli>O of<Deli>O opium<Deli>O after<Deli>O they<Deli>O opened<Deli>O fire<Deli>O on<Deli>O police<Deli>O and<Deli>O killed<Deli>O a<Deli>O pedestrain<Deli>O and<Deli>O wounded<Deli>O four<Deli>O ,<Deli>O the<Deli>O newspaper<Deli>O quoted<Deli>O a<Deli>O police<Deli>O commander<Deli>O as<Deli>O saying<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Resalat<Deli>I-ORG said<Deli>O the<Deli>O executions<Deli>O were<Deli>O ordered<Deli>O by<Deli>O the<Deli>O Islamic<Deli>I-ORG Revolutionary<Deli>I-ORG Court<Deli>I-ORG .<Deli>O 
It<Deli>O did<Deli>O not<Deli>O say<Deli>O when<Deli>O they<Deli>O took<Deli>O place<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
One<Deli>O of<Deli>O the<Deli>O men<Deli>O ,<Deli>O who<Deli>O killed<Deli>O the<Deli>O pedestrian<Deli>O ,<Deli>O was<Deli>O hanged<Deli>O at<Deli>O the<Deli>O site<Deli>O of<Deli>O the<Deli>O crime<Deli>O and<Deli>O the<Deli>O other<Deli>O was<Deli>O executed<Deli>O in<Deli>O Adel<Deli>I-LOC prison<Deli>O in<Deli>O Shiraz<Deli>I-LOC ,<Deli>O the<Deli>O newspaper<Deli>O said<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Possession<Deli>O of<Deli>O 30<Deli>O grammes<Deli>O (<Deli>O just<Deli>O over<Deli>O an<Deli>O ounce<Deli>O )<Deli>O of<Deli>O heroin<Deli>O or<Deli>O five<Deli>O kg<Deli>O (<Deli>O 11<Deli>O lb<Deli>O )<Deli>O of<Deli>O opium<Deli>O is<Deli>O punishable<Deli>O by<Deli>O death<Deli>O in<Deli>O Iran<Deli>I-LOC .<Deli>O

The<Deli>O startup<Deli>O company<Deli>O 's<Deli>O acting<Deli>O chairman<Deli>O is<Deli>O Jim<Deli>I-PER Bidzos<Deli>I-PER ,<Deli>O the<Deli>O president<Deli>O of<Deli>O RSA<Deli>I-ORG Data<Deli>I-ORG Security<Deli>I-ORG ,<Deli>O a<Deli>O unit<Deli>O of<Deli>O Security<Deli>I-ORG Dynamics<Deli>I-ORG Technologies<Deli>I-ORG Inc.<Deli>I-ORG as<Deli>O well<Deli>O as<Deli>O chairman<Deli>O of<Deli>O VeriSign<Deli>I-ORG .<Deli>O 
Internet<Deli>I-ORG Startup<Deli>I-ORG ,<Deli>O which<Deli>O opened<Deli>O its<Deli>O doors<Deli>O with<Deli>O about<Deli>O half<Deli>O a<Deli>O dozen<Deli>O initial<Deli>O employees<Deli>O ,<Deli>O combines<Deli>O experience<Deli>O at<Deli>O JavaSoft<Deli>I-ORG ,<Deli>O Apple<Deli>I-ORG Computer<Deli>I-ORG Inc.<Deli>I-ORG ,<Deli>O and<Deli>O Oracle<Deli>I-ORG Systems<Deli>I-ORG .<Deli>O 
"<Deli>O Java<Deli>I-MISC portends<Deli>O dramatic<Deli>O changes<Deli>O in<Deli>O the<Deli>O way<Deli>O we<Deli>O use<Deli>O the<Deli>O Internet<Deli>I-MISC ,<Deli>O "<Deli>O said<Deli>O Hong<Deli>I-PER Bui<Deli>I-PER ,<Deli>O vice<Deli>O president<Deli>O of<Deli>O engineering<Deli>O of<Deli>O the<Deli>O new<Deli>O company<Deli>O after<Deli>O serving<Deli>O as<Deli>O a<Deli>O senior<Deli>O engineer<Deli>O at<Deli>O JavaSoft<Deli>I-ORG .<Deli>O 
Java<Deli>I-MISC is<Deli>O a<Deli>O computer<Deli>O programming<Deli>O language<Deli>O introduced<Deli>O by<Deli>O Sun<Deli>I-ORG Microsystems<Deli>I-ORG in<Deli>O mid-1995<Deli>O which<Deli>O has<Deli>O immediately<Deli>O captured<Deli>O the<Deli>O attention<Deli>O of<Deli>O the<Deli>O industry<Deli>O for<Deli>O its<Deli>O ability<Deli>O to<Deli>O operate<Deli>O across<Deli>O virtually<Deli>O all<Deli>O computer<Deli>O system<Deli>O in<Deli>O a<Deli>O relatively<Deli>O secure<Deli>O manner<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Just<Deli>O last<Deli>O week<Deli>O ,<Deli>O Sun<Deli>I-ORG Microsystems<Deli>I-ORG and<Deli>O the<Deli>O Silicon<Deli>I-LOC Valley<Deli>I-LOC venture<Deli>O capital<Deli>O giant<Deli>O Kleiner<Deli>I-ORG Perkins<Deli>I-ORG Caufield<Deli>I-ORG &<Deli>I-ORG Byers<Deli>I-ORG said<Deli>O they<Deli>O had<Deli>O completed<Deli>O financing<Deli>O of<Deli>O a<Deli>O $<Deli>O 100<Deli>O million<Deli>O fund<Deli>O managed<Deli>O by<Deli>O Kleiner<Deli>I-ORG Perkins<Deli>I-ORG to<Deli>O fund<Deli>O startups<Deli>O developing<Deli>O Java<Deli>I-MISC technologies<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Java<Deli>I-MISC has<Deli>O been<Deli>O licensed<Deli>O by<Deli>O nearly<Deli>O 50<Deli>O organisations<Deli>O ,<Deli>O ranging<Deli>O from<Deli>O Microsoft<Deli>I-ORG Corp.<Deli>I-ORG and<Deli>O International<Deli>I-ORG Business<Deli>I-ORG Machines<Deli>I-ORG Corp.<Deli>I-ORG to<Deli>O the<Deli>O Taiwan<Deli>I-LOC government<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Prasad<Deli>I-PER Wagle<Deli>I-PER ,<Deli>O another<Deli>O former<Deli>O senior<Deli>O JavaSoft<Deli>I-ORG engineer<Deli>O who<Deli>O is<Deli>O among<Deli>O the<Deli>O founding<Deli>O engineers<Deli>O at<Deli>O Internet<Deli>I-ORG Startup<Deli>I-ORG ,<Deli>O said<Deli>O the<Deli>O new<Deli>O company<Deli>O aims<Deli>O to<Deli>O build<Deli>O software<Deli>O infrastructure<Deli>O using<Deli>O Java<Deli>I-MISC to<Deli>O make<Deli>O networked<Deli>O applications<Deli>O ubiquitious<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
One<Deli>O feature<Deli>O of<Deli>O the<Deli>O Java<Deli>I-MISC language<Deli>O is<Deli>O that<Deli>O small<Deli>O software<Deli>O programmes<Deli>O ,<Deli>O known<Deli>O as<Deli>O "<Deli>O applets<Deli>O "<Deli>O because<Deli>O they<Deli>O are<Deli>O small<Deli>O applications<Deli>O ,<Deli>O can<Deli>O be<Deli>O downloaded<Deli>O from<Deli>O the<Deli>O server<Deli>O computers<Deli>O at<Deli>O the<Deli>O centre<Deli>O of<Deli>O networks<Deli>O onto<Deli>O individual<Deli>O computers<Deli>O for<Deli>O use<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
In<Deli>O this<Deli>O model<Deli>O ,<Deli>O individual<Deli>O computer<Deli>O users<Deli>O can<Deli>O always<Deli>O gain<Deli>O access<Deli>O to<Deli>O the<Deli>O latest<Deli>O programmes<Deli>O and<Deli>O do<Deli>O not<Deli>O need<Deli>O to<Deli>O store<Deli>O more<Deli>O software<Deli>O than<Deli>O they<Deli>O are<Deli>O currently<Deli>O using<Deli>O on<Deli>O their<Deli>O computers<Deli>O at<Deli>O any<Deli>O one<Deli>O time<Deli>O ,<Deli>O also<Deli>O saving<Deli>O costs<Deli>O of<Deli>O memory<Deli>O and<Deli>O storage<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Chris<Deli>I-PER Zuleeg<Deli>I-PER ,<Deli>O a<Deli>O veteran<Deli>O of<Deli>O Apple<Deli>I-ORG and<Deli>O a<Deli>O former<Deli>O JavaSoft<Deli>I-ORG marketing<Deli>O manager<Deli>O ,<Deli>O is<Deli>O vice<Deli>O president<Deli>O of<Deli>O marketing<Deli>O at<Deli>O Internet<Deli>I-ORG Startup<Deli>I-ORG ,<Deli>O whose<Deli>O Web<Deli>O site<Deli>O is<Deli>O www.internetstartup.com<Deli>O .<Deli>O

Takeda<Deli>I-PER ,<Deli>O 18<Deli>O ,<Deli>O showed<Deli>O poise<Deli>O far<Deli>O beyond<Deli>O his<Deli>O years<Deli>O to<Deli>O overtake<Deli>O Australian<Deli>I-MISC Ducati<Deli>I-ORG rider<Deli>O Troy<Deli>I-PER Corser<Deli>I-PER ,<Deli>O last<Deli>O year<Deli>O 's<Deli>O championship<Deli>O runner-up<Deli>O ,<Deli>O with<Deli>O four<Deli>O of<Deli>O the<Deli>O 25<Deli>O laps<Deli>O left<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Honda<Deli>I-ORG 's<Deli>O Takeda<Deli>I-PER was<Deli>O pursued<Deli>O past<Deli>O Corser<Deli>I-PER by<Deli>O the<Deli>O Yamaha<Deli>I-ORG duo<Deli>O of<Deli>O Noriyuki<Deli>I-PER Haga<Deli>I-PER and<Deli>O Wataru<Deli>I-PER Yoshikawa<Deli>I-PER with<Deli>O Haga<Deli>I-PER briefly<Deli>O taking<Deli>O the<Deli>O lead<Deli>O in<Deli>O the<Deli>O final<Deli>O chicane<Deli>O on<Deli>O the<Deli>O last<Deli>O lap<Deli>O .<Deli>O

Argentine<Deli>I-MISC striker<Deli>O Gabriel<Deli>I-PER Batistuta<Deli>I-PER gave<Deli>O Fiorentina<Deli>I-ORG the<Deli>O perfect<Deli>O 70th<Deli>O birthday<Deli>O present<Deli>O on<Deli>O Sunday<Deli>O with<Deli>O two<Deli>O goals<Deli>O that<Deli>O gave<Deli>O the<Deli>O Italian<Deli>I-MISC Cup<Deli>I-MISC winners<Deli>O a<Deli>O 2-1<Deli>O Supercup<Deli>I-MISC victory<Deli>O over<Deli>O serie<Deli>I-MISC A<Deli>I-MISC champions<Deli>O Milan<Deli>I-ORG .<Deli>O 
The<Deli>O victory<Deli>O ,<Deli>O coming<Deli>O on<Deli>O the<Deli>O eve<Deli>O of<Deli>O the<Deli>O founding<Deli>O of<Deli>O the<Deli>O Florence<Deli>I-LOC club<Deli>O in<Deli>O 1926<Deli>O ,<Deli>O also<Deli>O marked<Deli>O the<Deli>O first<Deli>O time<Deli>O since<Deli>O the<Deli>O pre-season<Deli>O trophy<Deli>O between<Deli>O the<Deli>O Cup<Deli>I-MISC winners<Deli>O and<Deli>O league<Deli>O champions<Deli>O was<Deli>O started<Deli>O in<Deli>O 1988<Deli>O that<Deli>O the<Deli>O Cup<Deli>I-MISC winners<Deli>O had<Deli>O won<Deli>O .<Deli>O

Commanders<Deli>O "<Deli>O Vicente<Deli>I-PER "<Deli>O and<Deli>O "<Deli>O Oscar<Deli>I-PER "<Deli>O ,<Deli>O guarded<Deli>O by<Deli>O a<Deli>O dozen<Deli>O EPR<Deli>I-ORG gunmen<Deli>O ,<Deli>O said<Deli>O in<Deli>O an<Deli>O interview<Deli>O with<Deli>O La<Deli>I-ORG Jornada<Deli>I-ORG outside<Deli>O Mexico<Deli>I-LOC City<Deli>I-LOC that<Deli>O the<Deli>O armed<Deli>O group<Deli>O was<Deli>O committed<Deli>O to<Deli>O overthrowing<Deli>O the<Deli>O government<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
"<Deli>O They<Deli>O (<Deli>O government<Deli>O officials<Deli>O )<Deli>O want<Deli>O to<Deli>O present<Deli>O us<Deli>O before<Deli>O public<Deli>O opinion<Deli>O as<Deli>O a<Deli>O local<Deli>O problem<Deli>O ,<Deli>O as<Deli>O just<Deli>O being<Deli>O from<Deli>O Guerrero<Deli>I-LOC and<Deli>O as<Deli>O irrational<Deli>O radicals<Deli>O ,<Deli>O "<Deli>O Commander<Deli>O Oscar<Deli>I-PER told<Deli>O La<Deli>I-ORG Jornada<Deli>I-ORG .<Deli>O 
They<Deli>O said<Deli>O the<Deli>O ERP<Deli>I-ORG ,<Deli>O whose<Deli>O fighters<Deli>O first<Deli>O appeared<Deli>O wearing<Deli>O military<Deli>O fatigues<Deli>O and<Deli>O brandishing<Deli>O assault<Deli>O rifles<Deli>O in<Deli>O the<Deli>O southwestern<Deli>O state<Deli>O of<Deli>O Guerrero<Deli>I-LOC on<Deli>O June<Deli>O 28<Deli>O ,<Deli>O had<Deli>O a<Deli>O 23,000-strong<Deli>O membership<Deli>O ,<Deli>O but<Deli>O this<Deli>O could<Deli>O not<Deli>O be<Deli>O confirmed<Deli>O independently<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
La<Deli>I-ORG Jornada<Deli>I-ORG also<Deli>O reported<Deli>O on<Deli>O Sunday<Deli>O that<Deli>O the<Deli>O Mexican<Deli>I-ORG Army<Deli>I-ORG has<Deli>O discovered<Deli>O a<Deli>O 37-page<Deli>O ,<Deli>O EPR<Deli>I-ORG manual<Deli>O detailing<Deli>O guerrilla<Deli>O tactics<Deli>O and<Deli>O strategies<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
It<Deli>O quoted<Deli>O the<Deli>O manual<Deli>O as<Deli>O saying<Deli>O :<Deli>O "<Deli>O The<Deli>O objective<Deli>O of<Deli>O the<Deli>O Basic<Deli>O Course<Deli>O on<Deli>O War<Deli>O is<Deli>O to<Deli>O provide<Deli>O for<Deli>O combatants<Deli>O of<Deli>O the<Deli>O EPR<Deli>I-ORG basic<Deli>O military<Deli>O knowledge<Deli>O for<Deli>O the<Deli>O armed<Deli>O conflict<Deli>O against<Deli>O the<Deli>O police<Deli>O and<Deli>O military<Deli>O apparatus<Deli>O of<Deli>O the<Deli>O bourgeoisie<Deli>O .<Deli>O "<Deli>O 
It<Deli>O was<Deli>O the<Deli>O second<Deli>O time<Deli>O armed<Deli>O "<Deli>O commanders<Deli>O "<Deli>O of<Deli>O the<Deli>O EPR<Deli>I-ORG have<Deli>O granted<Deli>O interviews<Deli>O outside<Deli>O Guerrero<Deli>I-LOC state<Deli>O ,<Deli>O an<Deli>O extremely<Deli>O poor<Deli>O and<Deli>O volatile<Deli>O region<Deli>O where<Deli>O leftist<Deli>O protesters<Deli>O often<Deli>O have<Deli>O clashed<Deli>O violently<Deli>O with<Deli>O authorities<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Unlike<Deli>O the<Deli>O better<Deli>O known<Deli>O and<Deli>O unrelated<Deli>O Zapatista<Deli>I-ORG rebels<Deli>O in<Deli>O southeastern<Deli>O Chiapas<Deli>I-LOC state<Deli>O ,<Deli>O the<Deli>O EPR<Deli>I-ORG has<Deli>O never<Deli>O taken<Deli>O on<Deli>O the<Deli>O army<Deli>O in<Deli>O direct<Deli>O combat<Deli>O ,<Deli>O according<Deli>O to<Deli>O official<Deli>O reports<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
There<Deli>O have<Deli>O only<Deli>O been<Deli>O a<Deli>O few<Deli>O skirmishes<Deli>O in<Deli>O Guerrero<Deli>I-LOC in<Deli>O which<Deli>O a<Deli>O handful<Deli>O of<Deli>O police<Deli>O ,<Deli>O soldiers<Deli>O and<Deli>O civilians<Deli>O have<Deli>O been<Deli>O killed<Deli>O or<Deli>O injured<Deli>O .<Deli>O

BOGOTA<Deli>I-LOC ,<Deli>O Colombia<Deli>I-LOC 1996-08-25<Deli>O 
Unidentified<Deli>O gunmen<Deli>O dragged<Deli>O 10<Deli>O men<Deli>O out<Deli>O ot<Deli>O their<Deli>O homes<Deli>O in<Deli>O a<Deli>O rural<Deli>O area<Deli>O of<Deli>O Colombia<Deli>I-LOC 's<Deli>O northwest<Deli>O province<Deli>O of<Deli>O Antioquia<Deli>I-LOC and<Deli>O shot<Deli>O them<Deli>O to<Deli>O death<Deli>O ,<Deli>O authorities<Deli>O said<Deli>O on<Deli>O Sunday<Deli>O .<Deli>O

MAE<Deli>I-LOC SOT<Deli>I-LOC ,<Deli>O Thailand<Deli>I-LOC 1996-08-25<Deli>O

The<Deli>O Thai<Deli>I-MISC army<Deli>O commander<Deli>O in<Deli>O the<Deli>O area<Deli>O ,<Deli>O Col<Deli>O Suvit<Deli>I-PER Maenmuan<Deli>I-PER ,<Deli>O told<Deli>O reporters<Deli>O the<Deli>O DKBA<Deli>I-ORG ,<Deli>O which<Deli>O is<Deli>O allied<Deli>O with<Deli>O the<Deli>O Rangoon<Deli>I-LOC military<Deli>O government<Deli>O and<Deli>O based<Deli>O in<Deli>O southeast<Deli>O Burma<Deli>I-LOC ,<Deli>O had<Deli>O recently<Deli>O stepped<Deli>O up<Deli>O cross-border<Deli>O infiltration<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Suvit<Deli>I-PER said<Deli>O the<Deli>O motive<Deli>O for<Deli>O their<Deli>O intrusions<Deli>O was<Deli>O not<Deli>O clear<Deli>O but<Deli>O he<Deli>O had<Deli>O ordered<Deli>O reinforcements<Deli>O to<Deli>O beef<Deli>O up<Deli>O security<Deli>O along<Deli>O the<Deli>O porous<Deli>O frontier<Deli>O .<Deli>O

Archaeologists<Deli>O in<Deli>O Egypt<Deli>I-LOC have<Deli>O found<Deli>O pots<Deli>O used<Deli>O by<Deli>O ancient<Deli>O Egyptians<Deli>I-MISC in<Deli>O burial<Deli>O rites<Deli>O that<Deli>O they<Deli>O say<Deli>O may<Deli>O reveal<Deli>O the<Deli>O secrets<Deli>O of<Deli>O mummification<Deli>O .<Deli>O

Saleh<Deli>I-PER said<Deli>O the<Deli>O team<Deli>O --<Deli>O from<Deli>O New<Deli>I-LOC York<Deli>I-LOC 's<Deli>O Metropolitan<Deli>I-LOC Museum<Deli>I-LOC --<Deli>O found<Deli>O four<Deli>O Canopic<Deli>I-MISC jars<Deli>O and<Deli>O two<Deli>O unguent<Deli>O jars<Deli>O in<Deli>O the<Deli>O tomb<Deli>O ,<Deli>O which<Deli>O belongs<Deli>O to<Deli>O an<Deli>O unidentifed<Deli>O person<Deli>O who<Deli>O lived<Deli>O during<Deli>O the<Deli>O 12th<Deli>I-MISC Dynasty<Deli>I-MISC (<Deli>O 1991-1786<Deli>O BC<Deli>I-MISC )<Deli>O in<Deli>O the<Deli>O Middle<Deli>I-LOC Kingdom<Deli>I-LOC .<Deli>O

MOSCOW<Deli>I-LOC 1996-08-26<Deli>O 
Russian<Deli>I-MISC double<Deli>O Olympic<Deli>I-MISC swimming<Deli>O champion<Deli>O Alexander<Deli>I-PER Popov<Deli>I-PER was<Deli>O in<Deli>O a<Deli>O serious<Deli>O condition<Deli>O on<Deli>O Monday<Deli>O after<Deli>O being<Deli>O stabbed<Deli>O on<Deli>O a<Deli>O Moscow<Deli>I-LOC street<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
A<Deli>O doctor<Deli>O said<Deli>O it<Deli>O was<Deli>O too<Deli>O early<Deli>O to<Deli>O say<Deli>O whether<Deli>O Popov<Deli>I-PER ,<Deli>O the<Deli>O only<Deli>O man<Deli>O to<Deli>O retain<Deli>O the<Deli>O Olympic<Deli>I-MISC 50<Deli>O and<Deli>O 100<Deli>O metres<Deli>O freestyle<Deli>O titles<Deli>O ,<Deli>O would<Deli>O return<Deli>O to<Deli>O top-level<Deli>O sport<Deli>O .<Deli>O

But<Deli>O he<Deli>O is<Deli>O conscious<Deli>O and<Deli>O is<Deli>O talking<Deli>O and<Deli>O smiling<Deli>O .<Deli>O "<Deli>O

Popov<Deli>I-PER ,<Deli>O who<Deli>O won<Deli>O gold<Deli>O in<Deli>O the<Deli>O 50<Deli>O and<Deli>O 100<Deli>O metres<Deli>O freestyle<Deli>O at<Deli>O the<Deli>O recent<Deli>O Atlanta<Deli>I-MISC Olympics<Deli>I-MISC ,<Deli>O was<Deli>O stabbed<Deli>O in<Deli>O the<Deli>O abdomen<Deli>O late<Deli>O on<Deli>O Saturday<Deli>O after<Deli>O an<Deli>O argument<Deli>O with<Deli>O a<Deli>O group<Deli>O of<Deli>O roadside<Deli>O watermelon<Deli>O sellers<Deli>O in<Deli>O south-west<Deli>O Moscow<Deli>I-LOC .<Deli>O

KIRKLAND<Deli>I-LOC ,<Deli>O Wash<Deli>I-LOC .<Deli>O 
1996-08-26<Deli>O 
Lamonts<Deli>I-ORG Apparel<Deli>I-ORG Inc<Deli>I-ORG ,<Deli>O an<Deli>O operator<Deli>O of<Deli>O 42<Deli>O family<Deli>O apparel<Deli>O stores<Deli>O in<Deli>O six<Deli>O northwestern<Deli>O states<Deli>O ,<Deli>O said<Deli>O it<Deli>O has<Deli>O filed<Deli>O a<Deli>O reorganization<Deli>O plan<Deli>O in<Deli>O bankruptcy<Deli>O court<Deli>O in<Deli>O Seattle<Deli>I-LOC .<Deli>O 
(<Deli>O Corrects<Deli>O to<Deli>O make<Deli>O clear<Deli>O a<Deli>O reorganization<Deli>O plan<Deli>O has<Deli>O been<Deli>O filed<Deli>O )<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
The<Deli>O reorganization<Deli>O plan<Deli>O calls<Deli>O for<Deli>O all<Deli>O secured<Deli>O claims<Deli>O to<Deli>O be<Deli>O paid<Deli>O in<Deli>O full<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Unsecured<Deli>O claims<Deli>O ,<Deli>O including<Deli>O those<Deli>O of<Deli>O company<Deli>O bondholders<Deli>O ,<Deli>O will<Deli>O be<Deli>O satisfied<Deli>O by<Deli>O issuing<Deli>O new<Deli>O common<Deli>O stock<Deli>O and<Deli>O warrants<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Unsecured<Deli>O claims<Deli>O are<Deli>O estimated<Deli>O at<Deli>O about<Deli>O $<Deli>O 90<Deli>O million<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Lamonts<Deli>I-ORG said<Deli>O it<Deli>O plans<Deli>O to<Deli>O issue<Deli>O 9<Deli>O million<Deli>O shares<Deli>O of<Deli>O new<Deli>O common<Deli>O stock<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Of<Deli>O that<Deli>O amount<Deli>O ,<Deli>O 4.05<Deli>O million<Deli>O and<Deli>O 5.67<Deli>O million<Deli>O shares<Deli>O will<Deli>O be<Deli>O allocated<Deli>O to<Deli>O the<Deli>O company<Deli>O 's<Deli>O trade<Deli>O creditors<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Between<Deli>O 4.75<Deli>O and<Deli>O 3.13<Deli>O million<Deli>O shares<Deli>O will<Deli>O be<Deli>O allocated<Deli>O to<Deli>O bondholders<Deli>O and<Deli>O other<Deli>O unsecured<Deli>O non-trade<Deli>O creditors<Deli>O and<Deli>O 200,000<Deli>O will<Deli>O be<Deli>O allocated<Deli>O to<Deli>O existing<Deli>O shareholders<Deli>O in<Deli>O exchange<Deli>O for<Deli>O all<Deli>O existing<Deli>O stock<Deli>O of<Deli>O the<Deli>O company<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Bondholders<Deli>O and<Deli>O other<Deli>O unsecured<Deli>O non-trade<Deli>O creditors<Deli>O will<Deli>O receive<Deli>O warrants<Deli>O four<Deli>O about<Deli>O 2.2<Deli>O million<Deli>O shares<Deli>O when<Deli>O the<Deli>O company<Deli>O 's<Deli>O market<Deli>O capitalization<Deli>O reaches<Deli>O $<Deli>O 20<Deli>O million<Deli>O .<Deli>O

Sayed<Deli>I-PER Salahuddin<Deli>I-PER 
KABUL<Deli>I-LOC 1996-08-27<Deli>O 
Afghan<Deli>I-MISC government<Deli>O military<Deli>O chief<Deli>O Ahmad<Deli>I-PER Shah<Deli>I-PER Masood<Deli>I-PER briefed<Deli>O visiting<Deli>O U.S.<Deli>I-LOC Congressman<Deli>O Dana<Deli>I-PER Rohrabacher<Deli>I-PER on<Deli>O Tuesday<Deli>O on<Deli>O a<Deli>O peace<Deli>O plan<Deli>O for<Deli>O his<Deli>O wartorn<Deli>O country<Deli>O .<Deli>O

The<Deli>O factions<Deli>O should<Deli>O agree<Deli>O to<Deli>O appoint<Deli>O a<Deli>O transitional<Deli>O leader<Deli>O ,<Deli>O draft<Deli>O a<Deli>O new<Deli>O constitution<Deli>O ,<Deli>O collect<Deli>O heavy<Deli>O weapons<Deli>O ,<Deli>O create<Deli>O a<Deli>O national<Deli>O army<Deli>O and<Deli>O hold<Deli>O free<Deli>O elections<Deli>O in<Deli>O which<Deli>O the<Deli>O transitional<Deli>O leader<Deli>O would<Deli>O be<Deli>O barred<Deli>O from<Deli>O standing<Deli>O ,<Deli>O he<Deli>O added<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Rohrabacher<Deli>I-PER flew<Deli>O into<Deli>O Bagram<Deli>I-LOC military<Deli>O airbase<Deli>O north<Deli>O of<Deli>O Kabul<Deli>I-LOC in<Deli>O a<Deli>O Red<Deli>I-ORG Cross<Deli>I-ORG plane<Deli>O on<Deli>O Tuesday<Deli>O after<Deli>O meeting<Deli>O northern<Deli>O opposition<Deli>O militia<Deli>O leader<Deli>O General<Deli>O Abdul<Deli>I-PER Rashid<Deli>I-PER Dostum<Deli>I-PER .<Deli>O 
Masood<Deli>I-PER 's<Deli>O spokesman<Deli>O Amrollah<Deli>I-PER (<Deli>O one<Deli>O name<Deli>O )<Deli>O said<Deli>O Rohrabacher<Deli>I-PER had<Deli>O recently<Deli>O visited<Deli>O Italy<Deli>I-LOC ,<Deli>O Saudi<Deli>I-LOC Arabia<Deli>I-LOC and<Deli>O Pakistan<Deli>I-LOC as<Deli>O part<Deli>O of<Deli>O a<Deli>O mission<Deli>O to<Deli>O promote<Deli>O peace<Deli>O in<Deli>O Afghanistan<Deli>I-LOC .<Deli>O 
"<Deli>O We<Deli>O are<Deli>O certainly<Deli>O serious<Deli>O more<Deli>O than<Deli>O before<Deli>O to<Deli>O find<Deli>O a<Deli>O solution<Deli>O to<Deli>O the<Deli>O Afghan<Deli>I-MISC problem<Deli>O and<Deli>O support<Deli>O every<Deli>O U.N.<Deli>I-ORG plan<Deli>O ,<Deli>O "<Deli>O Amrollah<Deli>I-PER quoted<Deli>O Rohrabacher<Deli>I-PER as<Deli>O saying<Deli>O .<Deli>O

KARACHI<Deli>I-LOC ,<Deli>O Pakistan<Deli>I-LOC 1996-08-27<Deli>O 
The<Deli>O State<Deli>I-ORG (<Deli>I-ORG central<Deli>I-ORG )<Deli>I-ORG Bank<Deli>I-ORG of<Deli>O Pakistan<Deli>I-LOC auctioned<Deli>O three-<Deli>O ,<Deli>O five-<Deli>O and<Deli>O 10-year<Deli>O federal<Deli>O investment<Deli>O bonds<Deli>O worth<Deli>O 1.38<Deli>O billion<Deli>O rupees<Deli>O on<Deli>O Tuesday<Deli>O .<Deli>O

Nepal<Deli>I-LOC offers<Deli>O to<Deli>O talk<Deli>O to<Deli>O Maoist<Deli>I-MISC insurgents<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Gopal<Deli>I-PER Sharma<Deli>I-PER 
KATHMANDU<Deli>I-LOC 1996-08-27<Deli>O 
Nepal<Deli>I-LOC 's<Deli>O centre-right<Deli>O coalition<Deli>O government<Deli>O has<Deli>O offered<Deli>O to<Deli>O meet<Deli>O the<Deli>O country<Deli>O 's<Deli>O hardline<Deli>O Maoist<Deli>I-MISC communists<Deli>O for<Deli>O talks<Deli>O in<Deli>O a<Deli>O bid<Deli>O to<Deli>O end<Deli>O an<Deli>O insurgency<Deli>O in<Deli>O Nepal<Deli>I-LOC 's<Deli>O western<Deli>O districts<Deli>O ,<Deli>O officials<Deli>O said<Deli>O on<Deli>O Tuesday<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
The<Deli>O Maoists<Deli>I-MISC oppose<Deli>O multi-party<Deli>O democracy<Deli>O and<Deli>O want<Deli>O to<Deli>O establish<Deli>O a<Deli>O communist<Deli>O state<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
But<Deli>O the<Deli>O Nepali<Deli>I-MISC government<Deli>O said<Deli>O the<Deli>O insurgents<Deli>O must<Deli>O give<Deli>O up<Deli>O violence<Deli>O before<Deli>O it<Deli>O negotiates<Deli>O with<Deli>O them<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
"<Deli>O They<Deli>O (<Deli>O the<Deli>O insurgents<Deli>O )<Deli>O should<Deli>O first<Deli>O give<Deli>O up<Deli>O their<Deli>O violent<Deli>O activities<Deli>O ,<Deli>O "<Deli>O Home<Deli>O (<Deli>O Interior<Deli>O )<Deli>O Minister<Deli>O Khum<Deli>I-PER Bahadur<Deli>I-PER Khadga<Deli>I-PER said<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
About<Deli>O 54<Deli>O people<Deli>O have<Deli>O died<Deli>O in<Deli>O Maoist<Deli>I-MISC insurgent<Deli>O activity<Deli>O and<Deli>O in<Deli>O police<Deli>O action<Deli>O against<Deli>O them<Deli>O since<Deli>O February<Deli>O ,<Deli>O officials<Deli>O said<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Nepali<Deli>I-MISC opposition<Deli>O parties<Deli>O have<Deli>O accused<Deli>O the<Deli>O police<Deli>O of<Deli>O having<Deli>O killed<Deli>O more<Deli>O people<Deli>O than<Deli>O the<Deli>O insurgents<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Some<Deli>O human<Deli>O rights<Deli>O groups<Deli>O have<Deli>O criticised<Deli>O the<Deli>O government<Deli>O 's<Deli>O handling<Deli>O of<Deli>O the<Deli>O situation<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
In<Deli>O a<Deli>O speech<Deli>O in<Deli>O parliament<Deli>O on<Deli>O Tuesday<Deli>O ,<Deli>O Khadga<Deli>I-PER challenged<Deli>O the<Deli>O Maoist<Deli>I-MISC communists<Deli>O to<Deli>O "<Deli>O win<Deli>O the<Deli>O people<Deli>O 's<Deli>O confidence<Deli>O "<Deli>O and<Deli>O win<Deli>O election<Deli>O to<Deli>O parliament<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
On<Deli>O Monday<Deli>O ,<Deli>O he<Deli>O had<Deli>O offered<Deli>O to<Deli>O talk<Deli>O to<Deli>O leaders<Deli>O of<Deli>O the<Deli>O United<Deli>I-ORG People<Deli>I-ORG 's<Deli>I-ORG Front<Deli>I-ORG Nepal<Deli>I-ORG (<Deli>O Bhattarai<Deli>I-ORG )<Deli>O ,<Deli>O the<Deli>O Maoist<Deli>I-MISC faction<Deli>O which<Deli>O leads<Deli>O the<Deli>O insurgency<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
"<Deli>O The<Deli>O government<Deli>O is<Deli>O ready<Deli>O to<Deli>O guarantee<Deli>O security<Deli>O of<Deli>O the<Deli>O Maoist<Deli>I-MISC representatives<Deli>O who<Deli>O want<Deli>O to<Deli>O take<Deli>O part<Deli>O in<Deli>O peaceful<Deli>O dialogue<Deli>O ,<Deli>O "<Deli>O Khadga<Deli>I-PER said<Deli>O .<Deli>O

The<Deli>O Speaker<Deli>O of<Deli>O Bangladesh<Deli>I-LOC 's<Deli>O parliament<Deli>O ,<Deli>O Humayun<Deli>I-PER Rasheed<Deli>I-PER Choudhury<Deli>I-PER ,<Deli>O said<Deli>O he<Deli>O had<Deli>O received<Deli>O death<Deli>O threats<Deli>O from<Deli>O anonymous<Deli>O callers<Deli>O after<Deli>O opposition<Deli>O parties<Deli>O threatened<Deli>O to<Deli>O boycott<Deli>O proceedings<Deli>O chaired<Deli>O by<Deli>O him<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
He<Deli>O told<Deli>O the<Deli>O Bengali<Deli>I-MISC newspaper<Deli>O Banglabazar<Deli>I-ORG Patrika<Deli>I-ORG on<Deli>O Tuesday<Deli>O that<Deli>O such<Deli>O threats<Deli>O were<Deli>O possibly<Deli>O coming<Deli>O from<Deli>O "<Deli>O those<Deli>O who<Deli>O want<Deli>O to<Deli>O push<Deli>O the<Deli>O country<Deli>O into<Deli>O chaos<Deli>O and<Deli>O unrest<Deli>O .<Deli>O "<Deli>O 
The<Deli>O callers<Deli>O said<Deli>O his<Deli>O life<Deli>O could<Deli>O be<Deli>O cut<Deli>O short<Deli>O ,<Deli>O the<Deli>O newspaper<Deli>O said<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
The<Deli>O speaker<Deli>O was<Deli>O not<Deli>O immediately<Deli>O available<Deli>O for<Deli>O comment<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Choudhury<Deli>I-PER ,<Deli>O a<Deli>O former<Deli>O foreign<Deli>O minister<Deli>O and<Deli>O veteran<Deli>O diplomat<Deli>O ,<Deli>O was<Deli>O appointed<Deli>O speaker<Deli>O of<Deli>O the<Deli>O 330-member<Deli>O parliament<Deli>O on<Deli>O July<Deli>O 13<Deli>O ,<Deli>O a<Deli>O month<Deli>O after<Deli>O general<Deli>O elections<Deli>O returned<Deli>O the<Deli>O Awami<Deli>I-ORG League<Deli>I-ORG of<Deli>O Prime<Deli>O Minister<Deli>O Sheikh<Deli>O Hasina<Deli>I-PER to<Deli>O power<Deli>O after<Deli>O 21<Deli>O years<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Choudhury<Deli>I-PER also<Deli>O was<Deli>O president<Deli>O of<Deli>O the<Deli>O 41st<Deli>O session<Deli>O of<Deli>O the<Deli>O U.N.<Deli>I-ORG General<Deli>I-ORG Assembly<Deli>I-ORG in<Deli>O 1986-87<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Former<Deli>O prime<Deli>O minister<Deli>O Begum<Deli>I-PER Khaleda<Deli>I-PER Zia<Deli>I-PER ,<Deli>O now<Deli>O the<Deli>O opposition<Deli>O leader<Deli>O in<Deli>O parliament<Deli>O and<Deli>O head<Deli>O of<Deli>O the<Deli>O Bangladesh<Deli>I-ORG Nationalist<Deli>I-ORG Party<Deli>I-ORG (<Deli>O BNP<Deli>I-ORG )<Deli>O ,<Deli>O said<Deli>O her<Deli>O followers<Deli>O might<Deli>O boycott<Deli>O assemby<Deli>O sessions<Deli>O chaired<Deli>O by<Deli>O the<Deli>O "<Deli>O partisan<Deli>O "<Deli>O speaker<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
"<Deli>O The<Deli>O ruling<Deli>O Awami<Deli>O league<Deli>O is<Deli>O making<Deli>O parliament<Deli>O ineffective<Deli>O and<Deli>O the<Deli>O speaker<Deli>O is<Deli>O contributing<Deli>O to<Deli>O that<Deli>O by<Deli>O not<Deli>O allowing<Deli>O the<Deli>O opposition<Deli>O MPs<Deli>O enough<Deli>O time<Deli>O to<Deli>O speak<Deli>O ,<Deli>O "<Deli>O she<Deli>O told<Deli>O a<Deli>O rally<Deli>O in<Deli>O northern<Deli>O district<Deli>O of<Deli>O Bogra<Deli>I-LOC on<Deli>O Monday<Deli>O .<Deli>O

The<Deli>O food<Deli>O poisoning<Deli>O epidemic<Deli>O caused<Deli>O by<Deli>O the<Deli>O O-157<Deli>I-MISC colon<Deli>O bacillus<Deli>O in<Deli>O Sakai<Deli>I-LOC appears<Deli>O to<Deli>O be<Deli>O "<Deli>O settling<Deli>O down<Deli>O "<Deli>O ,<Deli>O Health<Deli>O Minister<Deli>O Naoto<Deli>I-PER Kan<Deli>I-PER was<Deli>O quoted<Deli>O by<Deli>O a<Deli>O government<Deli>O spokesman<Deli>O as<Deli>O telling<Deli>O the<Deli>O cabinet<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
The<Deli>O O-157<Deli>I-MISC colon<Deli>O bacillus<Deli>O has<Deli>O been<Deli>O found<Deli>O responsible<Deli>O for<Deli>O a<Deli>O widespread<Deli>O food<Deli>O poisoning<Deli>O epidemic<Deli>O that<Deli>O has<Deli>O killed<Deli>O 11<Deli>O people<Deli>O and<Deli>O made<Deli>O over<Deli>O 9,500<Deli>O ill<Deli>O this<Deli>O year<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Sakai<Deli>I-LOC ,<Deli>O near<Deli>O the<Deli>O regional<Deli>O commercial<Deli>O centre<Deli>O of<Deli>O Osaka<Deli>I-LOC ,<Deli>O has<Deli>O been<Deli>O hit<Deli>O hardest<Deli>O by<Deli>O the<Deli>O deadly<Deli>O bacteria<Deli>O ,<Deli>O with<Deli>O nearly<Deli>O 6,500<Deli>O ,<Deli>O mostly<Deli>O schoolchildren<Deli>O ,<Deli>O affected<Deli>O by<Deli>O the<Deli>O disease<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Two<Deli>O children<Deli>O in<Deli>O Sakai<Deli>I-LOC have<Deli>O died<Deli>O from<Deli>O complications<Deli>O associated<Deli>O with<Deli>O the<Deli>O bacteria<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Kan<Deli>I-PER told<Deli>O a<Deli>O cabinet<Deli>O meeting<Deli>O on<Deli>O Tuesday<Deli>O that<Deli>O no<Deli>O new<Deli>O victims<Deli>O have<Deli>O been<Deli>O reported<Deli>O since<Deli>O August<Deli>O 8<Deli>O ,<Deli>O indicating<Deli>O that<Deli>O the<Deli>O peak<Deli>O has<Deli>O passed<Deli>O ,<Deli>O at<Deli>O least<Deli>O for<Deli>O Sakai<Deli>I-LOC .<Deli>O 
Sakai<Deli>I-LOC officials<Deli>O agreed<Deli>O with<Deli>O the<Deli>O assessment<Deli>O ,<Deli>O but<Deli>O said<Deli>O it<Deli>O was<Deli>O too<Deli>O early<Deli>O to<Deli>O feel<Deli>O relieved<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
"<Deli>O There<Deli>O are<Deli>O still<Deli>O patients<Deli>O hospitalised<Deli>O and<Deli>O problems<Deli>O which<Deli>O must<Deli>O be<Deli>O dealt<Deli>O with<Deli>O ,<Deli>O "<Deli>O a<Deli>O city<Deli>O spokesman<Deli>O said<Deli>O ,<Deli>O citing<Deli>O the<Deli>O issue<Deli>O of<Deli>O whether<Deli>O to<Deli>O allow<Deli>O children<Deli>O infected<Deli>O with<Deli>O the<Deli>O bacteria<Deli>O but<Deli>O not<Deli>O showing<Deli>O symptoms<Deli>O to<Deli>O attend<Deli>O school<Deli>O from<Deli>O September<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Health<Deli>O authorities<Deli>O believe<Deli>O school<Deli>O lunches<Deli>O were<Deli>O the<Deli>O source<Deli>O of<Deli>O the<Deli>O food<Deli>O poisoning<Deli>O in<Deli>O Sakai<Deli>I-LOC ,<Deli>O but<Deli>O researchers<Deli>O have<Deli>O been<Deli>O unable<Deli>O to<Deli>O pinpoint<Deli>O the<Deli>O exact<Deli>O source<Deli>O of<Deli>O the<Deli>O infection<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
The<Deli>O outbreak<Deli>O has<Deli>O prompted<Deli>O authorities<Deli>O to<Deli>O tighten<Deli>O sanitary<Deli>O standards<Deli>O at<Deli>O slaughterhouses<Deli>O and<Deli>O meatpacking<Deli>O plants<Deli>O and<Deli>O sparked<Deli>O calls<Deli>O for<Deli>O an<Deli>O overhaul<Deli>O of<Deli>O the<Deli>O nation<Deli>O 's<Deli>O school<Deli>O lunch<Deli>O programme<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
The<Deli>O ministers<Deli>O agreed<Deli>O at<Deli>O Tuesday<Deli>O 's<Deli>O cabinet<Deli>O meeting<Deli>O to<Deli>O step<Deli>O up<Deli>O inspection<Deli>O measures<Deli>O for<Deli>O school<Deli>O lunches<Deli>O in<Deli>O September<Deli>O and<Deli>O October<Deli>O ,<Deli>O when<Deli>O schools<Deli>O around<Deli>O the<Deli>O country<Deli>O resume<Deli>O .<Deli>O

Japan<Deli>I-LOC aluminium<Deli>O shipments<Deli>O surge<Deli>O 8.9<Deli>O pct<Deli>O in<Deli>O July<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
TOKYO<Deli>I-LOC 1996-08-27<Deli>O

A<Deli>O federation<Deli>O official<Deli>O added<Deli>O that<Deli>O the<Deli>O half-year<Deli>O through<Deli>O September<Deli>O 1996<Deli>O also<Deli>O appeared<Deli>O likely<Deli>O to<Deli>O set<Deli>O a<Deli>O new<Deli>O record<Deli>O for<Deli>O can<Deli>O production<Deli>O ,<Deli>O despite<Deli>O cooler<Deli>O temperatures<Deli>O in<Deli>O August<Deli>O .<Deli>O

Burundi<Deli>I-LOC 's<Deli>O ambassador<Deli>O on<Deli>O Wednesday<Deli>O lashed<Deli>O out<Deli>O at<Deli>O economic<Deli>O sanctions<Deli>O imposed<Deli>O by<Deli>O African<Deli>I-MISC states<Deli>O and<Deli>O said<Deli>O any<Deli>O thought<Deli>O of<Deli>O an<Deli>O arms<Deli>O embargo<Deli>O would<Deli>O be<Deli>O a<Deli>O windfall<Deli>O for<Deli>O guerrillas<Deli>O fighting<Deli>O his<Deli>O army-run<Deli>O government<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
In<Deli>O a<Deli>O lengthy<Deli>O debate<Deli>O on<Deli>O Burundi<Deli>I-LOC before<Deli>O the<Deli>O U.N.<Deli>I-ORG Security<Deli>I-ORG Council<Deli>I-ORG ,<Deli>O Ambassador<Deli>O Nsanze<Deli>I-PER Terence<Deli>I-PER said<Deli>O the<Deli>O new<Deli>O military<Deli>O government<Deli>O took<Deli>O over<Deli>O to<Deli>O stabilise<Deli>O the<Deli>O country<Deli>O and<Deli>O wanted<Deli>O negotiations<Deli>O under<Deli>O former<Deli>O Tanzanian<Deli>I-MISC President<Deli>O Julius<Deli>I-PER Nyrere<Deli>I-PER .<Deli>O 
Nearly<Deli>O every<Deli>O African<Deli>I-MISC member<Deli>O who<Deli>O spoke<Deli>O ,<Deli>O as<Deli>O well<Deli>O as<Deli>O most<Deli>O Security<Deli>I-ORG Council<Deli>I-ORG members<Deli>O ,<Deli>O however<Deli>O ,<Deli>O were<Deli>O unsympathetic<Deli>O towards<Deli>O the<Deli>O government<Deli>O of<Deli>O President<Deli>O Pierre<Deli>I-PER Buyoya<Deli>I-PER ,<Deli>O an<Deli>O army<Deli>O major<Deli>O put<Deli>O in<Deli>O power<Deli>O in<Deli>O a<Deli>O July<Deli>O coup<Deli>O by<Deli>O the<Deli>O Tutsi-run<Deli>I-MISC military<Deli>O ,<Deli>O which<Deli>O is<Deli>O locked<Deli>O in<Deli>O a<Deli>O guerrilla<Deli>O war<Deli>O with<Deli>O the<Deli>O majority<Deli>O Hutus<Deli>I-MISC .<Deli>O 
"<Deli>O These<Deli>O (<Deli>O African<Deli>I-MISC )<Deli>O brothers<Deli>O should<Deli>O have<Deli>O been<Deli>O the<Deli>O first<Deli>O to<Deli>O bind<Deli>O the<Deli>O wounds<Deli>O of<Deli>O Burundi<Deli>I-LOC ,<Deli>O "<Deli>O Terence<Deli>I-PER said<Deli>O of<Deli>O the<Deli>O economic<Deli>O embargo<Deli>O .<Deli>O "<Deli>O 
Quite<Deli>O the<Deli>O contrary<Deli>O ,<Deli>O Burundi<Deli>I-LOC has<Deli>O seen<Deli>O economic<Deli>O war<Deli>O declared<Deli>O against<Deli>O it<Deli>O by<Deli>O fellow<Deli>O African<Deli>I-MISC people<Deli>O ...<Deli>O a<Deli>O gratuitous<Deli>O immolation<Deli>O of<Deli>O the<Deli>O people<Deli>O of<Deli>O Burundi<Deli>I-LOC .<Deli>O "<Deli>O 
He<Deli>O said<Deli>O his<Deli>O government<Deli>O had<Deli>O just<Deli>O asked<Deli>O U.N.<Deli>I-ORG human<Deli>O rights<Deli>O monitors<Deli>O to<Deli>O increase<Deli>O their<Deli>O numbers<Deli>O in<Deli>O Burundi<Deli>I-LOC in<Deli>O an<Deli>O effort<Deli>O "<Deli>O to<Deli>O put<Deli>O an<Deli>O end<Deli>O to<Deli>O this<Deli>O vicious<Deli>O circle<Deli>O of<Deli>O violence<Deli>O .<Deli>O "<Deli>O 
More<Deli>O than<Deli>O 150,000<Deli>O people<Deli>O have<Deli>O been<Deli>O killed<Deli>O in<Deli>O violence<Deli>O between<Deli>O the<Deli>O minority<Deli>O Tutsis<Deli>I-MISC and<Deli>O the<Deli>O majority<Deli>O Hutus<Deli>I-MISC since<Deli>O 1993<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Botswana<Deli>I-LOC 's<Deli>O envoy<Deli>O ,<Deli>O Mothusi<Deli>I-PER Nkgowe<Deli>I-PER ,<Deli>O said<Deli>O coups<Deli>O should<Deli>O be<Deli>O relegated<Deli>O "<Deli>O to<Deli>O the<Deli>O dump<Deli>O heap<Deli>O of<Deli>O history<Deli>O "<Deli>O as<Deli>O there<Deli>O could<Deli>O be<Deli>O no<Deli>O justification<Deli>O for<Deli>O the<Deli>O overthrow<Deli>O of<Deli>O a<Deli>O legitimate<Deli>O government<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Chile<Deli>I-LOC has<Deli>O proposed<Deli>O a<Deli>O resolution<Deli>O ,<Deli>O still<Deli>O under<Deli>O discussion<Deli>O ,<Deli>O that<Deli>O would<Deli>O impose<Deli>O an<Deli>O immediate<Deli>O arms<Deli>O embargo<Deli>O on<Deli>O Burundi<Deli>I-LOC and<Deli>O call<Deli>O for<Deli>O negotiations<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
The<Deli>O draft<Deli>O suggests<Deli>O further<Deli>O sanctions<Deli>O against<Deli>O those<Deli>O who<Deli>O impede<Deli>O a<Deli>O political<Deli>O solution<Deli>O .<Deli>O

KARACHI<Deli>I-LOC ,<Deli>O Pakistan<Deli>I-LOC 1996-08-28<Deli>O 
About<Deli>O 8,000<Deli>O protesters<Deli>O marched<Deli>O through<Deli>O Karachi<Deli>I-LOC on<Deli>O Wednesday<Deli>O demanding<Deli>O the<Deli>O removal<Deli>O of<Deli>O Pakistani<Deli>I-MISC Prime<Deli>O Minister<Deli>O Benazir<Deli>I-PER Bhutto<Deli>I-PER ,<Deli>O witnesses<Deli>O said<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
"<Deli>O From<Deli>O here<Deli>O we<Deli>O will<Deli>O march<Deli>O to<Deli>O Islamabad<Deli>I-LOC and<Deli>O by<Deli>O God<Deli>I-PER we<Deli>O will<Deli>O not<Deli>O let<Deli>O Benazir<Deli>I-PER and<Deli>O (<Deli>O Bhutto<Deli>I-PER 's<Deli>O husband<Deli>O Asif<Deli>I-PER Ali<Deli>I-PER )<Deli>O Zardari<Deli>I-PER escape<Deli>O justice<Deli>O ,<Deli>O "<Deli>O Nawaz<Deli>I-PER Sharif<Deli>I-PER ,<Deli>O leader<Deli>O of<Deli>O the<Deli>O main<Deli>O opposition<Deli>O Pakistan<Deli>I-ORG Muslim<Deli>I-ORG League<Deli>I-ORG told<Deli>O a<Deli>O rally<Deli>O organised<Deli>O by<Deli>O a<Deli>O 16-party<Deli>O alliance<Deli>O .<Deli>O

The<Deli>O event<Deli>O was<Deli>O part<Deli>O of<Deli>O an<Deli>O opposition<Deli>O campaign<Deli>O launched<Deli>O on<Deli>O August<Deli>O 14<Deli>O ,<Deli>O Pakistan<Deli>I-LOC 's<Deli>O independence<Deli>O day<Deli>O .<Deli>O

"<Deli>O I<Deli>O promise<Deli>O the<Deli>O people<Deli>O of<Deli>O Karachi<Deli>I-LOC that<Deli>O those<Deli>O responsible<Deli>O for<Deli>O the<Deli>O extra-judicial<Deli>O killing<Deli>O of<Deli>O innocent<Deli>O youths<Deli>O would<Deli>O not<Deli>O be<Deli>O spared<Deli>O ,<Deli>O "<Deli>O Sharif<Deli>I-PER said<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Karachi<Deli>I-LOC 's<Deli>O ethnic<Deli>O Mohajir<Deli>I-ORG National<Deli>I-ORG Movement<Deli>I-ORG (<Deli>O MQM<Deli>I-ORG )<Deli>O accuses<Deli>O the<Deli>O government<Deli>O of<Deli>O killing<Deli>O many<Deli>O of<Deli>O its<Deli>O militants<Deli>O in<Deli>O cold<Deli>O blood<Deli>O .<Deli>O

BOMBAY<Deli>I-LOC 1996-08-28<Deli>O 
India<Deli>I-LOC 's<Deli>O leading<Deli>O cement<Deli>O firm<Deli>O Associated<Deli>I-ORG Cement<Deli>I-ORG Companies<Deli>I-ORG (<Deli>O ACC<Deli>I-ORG )<Deli>O said<Deli>O on<Deli>O Wednesday<Deli>O its<Deli>O cement<Deli>O sales<Deli>O rose<Deli>O to<Deli>O 3.1<Deli>O million<Deli>O tonnes<Deli>O in<Deli>O April-July<Deli>O 1996<Deli>O from<Deli>O 2.93<Deli>O million<Deli>O a<Deli>O year<Deli>O ago<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
ACC<Deli>I-ORG Chairman<Deli>O Nani<Deli>I-PER Palkhivala<Deli>I-PER told<Deli>O shareholders<Deli>O at<Deli>O the<Deli>O firm<Deli>O 's<Deli>O annual<Deli>O meeting<Deli>O cement<Deli>O output<Deli>O rose<Deli>O to<Deli>O 3.14<Deli>O million<Deli>O tonnes<Deli>O in<Deli>O the<Deli>O first<Deli>O quarter<Deli>O of<Deli>O 1996/97<Deli>O (<Deli>O April-March<Deli>O )<Deli>O ,<Deli>O from<Deli>O 3.01<Deli>O million<Deli>O a<Deli>O year<Deli>O ago<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Palkhivala<Deli>I-PER said<Deli>O ACC<Deli>I-ORG had<Deli>O secured<Deli>O government<Deli>O approval<Deli>O to<Deli>O take<Deli>O over<Deli>O a<Deli>O sick<Deli>O cement<Deli>O firm<Deli>O with<Deli>O a<Deli>O grinding<Deli>O capacity<Deli>O of<Deli>O 275,000<Deli>O tonnes<Deli>O per<Deli>O year<Deli>O .<Deli>O "<Deli>O

"<Deli>O The<Deli>O industry<Deli>O saw<Deli>O capacity<Deli>O expansion<Deli>O of<Deli>O about<Deli>O 13<Deli>O percent<Deli>O over<Deli>O 1994/95<Deli>O from<Deli>O 77.79<Deli>O million<Deli>O tonnes<Deli>O to<Deli>O 87.45<Deli>O million<Deli>O tonnes<Deli>O ,<Deli>O "<Deli>O Palkhivala<Deli>I-PER told<Deli>O shareholders<Deli>O .<Deli>O

BOMBAY<Deli>I-LOC 1996-08-28<Deli>O

RAMESWARAM<Deli>I-LOC ,<Deli>O India<Deli>I-LOC 1996-08-28<Deli>O 
Indian<Deli>I-MISC fishermen<Deli>O said<Deli>O on<Deli>O Wednesday<Deli>O they<Deli>O had<Deli>O been<Deli>O forced<Deli>O at<Deli>O gunpoint<Deli>O to<Deli>O ferry<Deli>O refugees<Deli>O fleeing<Deli>O the<Deli>O ethnic<Deli>O war<Deli>O in<Deli>O Sri<Deli>I-LOC Lanka<Deli>I-LOC to<Deli>O India<Deli>I-LOC ,<Deli>O as<Deli>O a<Deli>O protest<Deli>O strike<Deli>O by<Deli>O more<Deli>O than<Deli>O 30,000<Deli>O fishermen<Deli>O entered<Deli>O its<Deli>O ninth<Deli>O day<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
"<Deli>O There<Deli>O is<Deli>O little<Deli>O we<Deli>O can<Deli>O do<Deli>O when<Deli>O at<Deli>O mid-sea<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
The<Deli>O LTTE<Deli>I-ORG (<Deli>O Liberation<Deli>I-ORG Tigers<Deli>I-ORG of<Deli>I-ORG Tamil<Deli>I-ORG Eelam<Deli>I-ORG )<Deli>O accosts<Deli>O us<Deli>O and<Deli>O ,<Deli>O at<Deli>O the<Deli>O point<Deli>O of<Deli>O a<Deli>O gun<Deli>O ,<Deli>O forces<Deli>O us<Deli>O to<Deli>O take<Deli>O refugees<Deli>O ,<Deli>O "<Deli>O said<Deli>O senior<Deli>O fishermen<Deli>O leader<Deli>O P.<Deli>I-PER Arulanandam<Deli>I-PER .<Deli>O 
Some<Deli>O 850<Deli>O refugees<Deli>O have<Deli>O landed<Deli>O in<Deli>O recent<Deli>O weeks<Deli>O at<Deli>O the<Deli>O port<Deli>O of<Deli>O Rameswaram<Deli>I-LOC in<Deli>O the<Deli>O southern<Deli>O Indian<Deli>I-MISC state<Deli>O of<Deli>O Tamil<Deli>I-LOC Nadu<Deli>I-LOC ,<Deli>O home<Deli>O to<Deli>O 50<Deli>O million<Deli>O Tamil-speaking<Deli>I-MISC people<Deli>O ,<Deli>O port<Deli>O officials<Deli>O say<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Rameswaram<Deli>I-LOC is<Deli>O 15<Deli>O km<Deli>O (<Deli>O 10<Deli>O miles<Deli>O )<Deli>O off<Deli>O the<Deli>O coast<Deli>O of<Deli>O Sri<Deli>I-LOC Lanka<Deli>I-LOC .<Deli>O 
State<Deli>O chief<Deli>O minister<Deli>O M.<Deli>I-PER Karunanidhi<Deli>I-PER has<Deli>O publicly<Deli>O welcomed<Deli>O the<Deli>O refugees<Deli>O ,<Deli>O who<Deli>O are<Deli>O fleeing<Deli>O the<Deli>O 13-year<Deli>O war<Deli>O between<Deli>O Tamil<Deli>I-MISC separatists<Deli>O and<Deli>O government<Deli>O troops<Deli>O that<Deli>O Colombo<Deli>I-LOC says<Deli>O has<Deli>O cost<Deli>O 50,000<Deli>O lives<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
But<Deli>O the<Deli>O influx<Deli>O has<Deli>O triggered<Deli>O fears<Deli>O of<Deli>O a<Deli>O repeat<Deli>O of<Deli>O the<Deli>O 1980s<Deli>O when<Deli>O some<Deli>O 200,000<Deli>O refugees<Deli>O landed<Deli>O in<Deli>O Tamil<Deli>I-LOC Nadu<Deli>I-LOC .<Deli>O 
Intelligence<Deli>O officals<Deli>O said<Deli>O more<Deli>O than<Deli>O 5,000<Deli>O Tamils<Deli>I-MISC were<Deli>O waiting<Deli>O on<Deli>O the<Deli>O western<Deli>O coast<Deli>O of<Deli>O Sri<Deli>I-LOC Lanka<Deli>I-LOC to<Deli>O cross<Deli>O into<Deli>O India<Deli>I-LOC .<Deli>O 
The<Deli>O Indian<Deli>I-MISC government<Deli>O has<Deli>O warned<Deli>O its<Deli>O fishermen<Deli>O that<Deli>O their<Deli>O boats<Deli>O would<Deli>O be<Deli>O impounded<Deli>O if<Deli>O they<Deli>O were<Deli>O caught<Deli>O ferrying<Deli>O refugees<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
The<Deli>O fishermen<Deli>O went<Deli>O on<Deli>O strike<Deli>O last<Deli>O week<Deli>O to<Deli>O protest<Deli>O the<Deli>O government<Deli>O 's<Deli>O cancellation<Deli>O of<Deli>O three<Deli>O trawlers<Deli>O '<Deli>O fishing<Deli>O licenses<Deli>O after<Deli>O the<Deli>O boats<Deli>O were<Deli>O caught<Deli>O carrying<Deli>O Tamil<Deli>I-MISC refugees<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
All<Deli>I-ORG Fishermen<Deli>I-ORG 's<Deli>I-ORG Association<Deli>I-ORG secretary<Deli>O N.J.<Deli>I-PER Bose<Deli>I-PER said<Deli>O the<Deli>O strike<Deli>O would<Deli>O continue<Deli>O indefinitely<Deli>O and<Deli>O the<Deli>O fishermen<Deli>O would<Deli>O block<Deli>O road<Deli>O and<Deli>O rail<Deli>O traffic<Deli>O if<Deli>O their<Deli>O demands<Deli>O were<Deli>O not<Deli>O met<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
"<Deli>O Until<Deli>O the<Deli>O government<Deli>O releases<Deli>O our<Deli>O boats<Deli>O from<Deli>O naval<Deli>O custody<Deli>O and<Deli>O Sri<Deli>I-MISC Lankan<Deli>I-MISC naval<Deli>O custody<Deli>O ,<Deli>O and<Deli>O gives<Deli>O us<Deli>O assurance<Deli>O (<Deli>O it<Deli>O will<Deli>O not<Deli>O revoke<Deli>O licences<Deli>O of<Deli>O boats<Deli>O ferrying<Deli>O refugees<Deli>O )<Deli>O ,<Deli>O we<Deli>O will<Deli>O not<Deli>O call<Deli>O off<Deli>O our<Deli>O strike<Deli>O ,<Deli>O "<Deli>O Bose<Deli>I-PER said<Deli>O .<Deli>O

"<Deli>O We<Deli>O have<Deli>O not<Deli>O gone<Deli>O to<Deli>O sea<Deli>O since<Deli>O August<Deli>O 19<Deli>O ,<Deli>O but<Deli>O refugees<Deli>O are<Deli>O arriving<Deli>O daily<Deli>O nevertheless<Deli>O .<Deli>O

An<Deli>O announcement<Deli>O was<Deli>O planned<Deli>O in<Deli>O Chicago<Deli>I-LOC Wednesday<Deli>O .<Deli>O

BERLIN<Deli>I-LOC 1996-08-28<Deli>O

The<Deli>O case<Deli>O is<Deli>O one<Deli>O of<Deli>O only<Deli>O a<Deli>O handful<Deli>O in<Deli>O which<Deli>O authorities<Deli>O have<Deli>O managed<Deli>O to<Deli>O track<Deli>O down<Deli>O suspects<Deli>O under<Deli>O a<Deli>O law<Deli>O which<Deli>O lets<Deli>O them<Deli>O pursue<Deli>O Germans<Deli>I-MISC who<Deli>O commit<Deli>O sex<Deli>O offences<Deli>O abroad<Deli>O .<Deli>O

The<Deli>O officials<Deli>O said<Deli>O New<Deli>I-ORG Party<Deli>I-ORG Sakigake<Deli>I-ORG President<Deli>O Masayoshi<Deli>I-PER Takemura<Deli>I-PER ,<Deli>O finance<Deli>O minister<Deli>O until<Deli>O the<Deli>O beginning<Deli>O of<Deli>O this<Deli>O year<Deli>O ,<Deli>O promised<Deli>O his<Deli>O resignation<Deli>O in<Deli>O a<Deli>O meeting<Deli>O with<Deli>O the<Deli>O politician<Deli>O who<Deli>O set<Deli>O off<Deli>O the<Deli>O rebellion<Deli>O in<Deli>O the<Deli>O smallest<Deli>O coalition<Deli>O member<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
They<Deli>O said<Deli>O the<Deli>O date<Deli>O of<Deli>O Takemura<Deli>I-PER 's<Deli>O resignation<Deli>O would<Deli>O be<Deli>O determined<Deli>O by<Deli>O party<Deli>O officials<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
The<Deli>O Sakigake<Deli>I-ORG row<Deli>O has<Deli>O caused<Deli>O jitters<Deli>O in<Deli>O its<Deli>O coalition<Deli>O partners<Deli>O ,<Deli>O Prime<Deli>O Minister<Deli>O Ryutaro<Deli>I-PER Hashimoto<Deli>I-PER 's<Deli>O Liberal<Deli>I-ORG Democratic<Deli>I-ORG Party<Deli>I-ORG (<Deli>O LDP<Deli>I-ORG )<Deli>O ,<Deli>O the<Deli>O biggest<Deli>O grouping<Deli>O ,<Deli>O and<Deli>O the<Deli>O Social<Deli>I-ORG Democratic<Deli>I-ORG Party<Deli>I-ORG .<Deli>O 
But<Deli>O analysts<Deli>O said<Deli>O the<Deli>O row<Deli>O was<Deli>O not<Deli>O expected<Deli>O to<Deli>O immediately<Deli>O destabilise<Deli>O the<Deli>O government<Deli>O as<Deli>O even<Deli>O if<Deli>O Sakigake<Deli>I-ORG splits<Deli>O apart<Deli>O it<Deli>O has<Deli>O so<Deli>O few<Deli>O seats<Deli>O a<Deli>O loss<Deli>O of<Deli>O support<Deli>O would<Deli>O not<Deli>O lead<Deli>O to<Deli>O a<Deli>O general<Deli>O election<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
The<Deli>O dispute<Deli>O pits<Deli>O Takemura<Deli>I-PER ,<Deli>O who<Deli>O founded<Deli>O Sakigake<Deli>I-ORG in<Deli>O 1993<Deli>O as<Deli>O a<Deli>O reform-oriented<Deli>O LDP<Deli>I-ORG splinter<Deli>O group<Deli>O ,<Deli>O against<Deli>O party<Deli>O official<Deli>O Yukio<Deli>I-PER Hatoyama<Deli>I-PER ,<Deli>O who<Deli>O says<Deli>O he<Deli>O will<Deli>O leave<Deli>O Sakigake<Deli>I-ORG to<Deli>O form<Deli>O a<Deli>O reformist<Deli>O political<Deli>O group<Deli>O next<Deli>O month<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Hatoyama<Deli>I-PER ,<Deli>O the<Deli>O 49-year-old<Deli>O grandson<Deli>O of<Deli>O a<Deli>O 1950s<Deli>O prime<Deli>O minister<Deli>O ,<Deli>O on<Deli>O Tuesday<Deli>O quit<Deli>O as<Deli>O Sakigake<Deli>I-ORG secretary<Deli>O general<Deli>O and<Deli>O has<Deli>O publicly<Deli>O snubbed<Deli>O the<Deli>O 62-year-old<Deli>O Takemura<Deli>I-PER ,<Deli>O pointedly<Deli>O ruling<Deli>O his<Deli>O mentor<Deli>O out<Deli>O as<Deli>O a<Deli>O possible<Deli>O member<Deli>O of<Deli>O the<Deli>O new<Deli>O political<Deli>O force<Deli>O .<Deli>O

The<Deli>O U.N.<Deli>I-ORG Department<Deli>I-ORG of<Deli>I-ORG Humanitarian<Deli>I-ORG Affairs<Deli>I-ORG (<Deli>O DHA<Deli>I-ORG )<Deli>O ,<Deli>O which<Deli>O has<Deli>O to<Deli>O coordinate<Deli>O the<Deli>O distribution<Deli>O of<Deli>O food<Deli>O ,<Deli>O medicine<Deli>O and<Deli>O other<Deli>O goods<Deli>O ,<Deli>O increased<Deli>O the<Deli>O number<Deli>O of<Deli>O monitors<Deli>O earlier<Deli>O this<Deli>O month<Deli>O at<Deli>O the<Deli>O insistence<Deli>O of<Deli>O the<Deli>O United<Deli>I-LOC States<Deli>I-LOC .<Deli>O 
According<Deli>O to<Deli>O U.N.<Deli>I-ORG officials<Deli>O and<Deli>O diplomats<Deli>O ,<Deli>O Iraq<Deli>I-LOC would<Deli>O have<Deli>O about<Deli>O $<Deli>O 1.13<Deli>O billion<Deli>O to<Deli>O spend<Deli>O for<Deli>O food<Deli>O ,<Deli>O medicine<Deli>O and<Deli>O other<Deli>O goods<Deli>O after<Deli>O monies<Deli>O for<Deli>O a<Deli>O reparations<Deli>O fund<Deli>O for<Deli>O Gulf<Deli>I-MISC War<Deli>I-MISC victims<Deli>O and<Deli>O costs<Deli>O for<Deli>O U.N.<Deli>I-ORG weapons<Deli>O inspections<Deli>O were<Deli>O deducted<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
The<Deli>O cost<Deli>O of<Deli>O the<Deli>O U.N.<Deli>I-ORG staff<Deli>O overseeing<Deli>O the<Deli>O distribution<Deli>O of<Deli>O food<Deli>O and<Deli>O other<Deli>O supplies<Deli>O was<Deli>O estimated<Deli>O to<Deli>O cost<Deli>O $<Deli>O 31<Deli>O million<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
In<Deli>O addition<Deli>O another<Deli>O $<Deli>O 12<Deli>O million<Deli>O was<Deli>O anticipated<Deli>O to<Deli>O cover<Deli>O other<Deli>O expenses<Deli>O ,<Deli>O such<Deli>O as<Deli>O oil<Deli>O experts<Deli>O and<Deli>O administrative<Deli>O costs<Deli>O .<Deli>O

PARIS<Deli>I-LOC 1996-08-29<Deli>O 
Thousands<Deli>O of<Deli>O farmers<Deli>O threw<Deli>O up<Deli>O roadblocks<Deli>O across<Deli>O France<Deli>I-LOC overnight<Deli>O ,<Deli>O stopping<Deli>O and<Deli>O checking<Deli>O lorries<Deli>O suspected<Deli>O of<Deli>O importing<Deli>O meat<Deli>O from<Deli>O outside<Deli>O the<Deli>O European<Deli>I-ORG Union<Deli>I-ORG ,<Deli>O French<Deli>I-MISC radios<Deli>O reported<Deli>O on<Deli>O Thursday<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Radio<Deli>O stations<Deli>O said<Deli>O around<Deli>O 15,000<Deli>O farmers<Deli>O ,<Deli>O angered<Deli>O by<Deli>O a<Deli>O fall<Deli>O in<Deli>O beef<Deli>O prices<Deli>O following<Deli>O the<Deli>O mad<Deli>O cow<Deli>O disease<Deli>O crisis<Deli>O ,<Deli>O staged<Deli>O protests<Deli>O in<Deli>O many<Deli>O areas<Deli>O and<Deli>O blockaded<Deli>O several<Deli>O main<Deli>O roads<Deli>O and<Deli>O motorways<Deli>O .<Deli>O

Gazprom<Deli>I-ORG rises<Deli>O to<Deli>O 2,901.48<Deli>O rbls<Deli>O at<Deli>O auction<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
MOSCOW<Deli>I-LOC 1996-08-29<Deli>O

Gazprom<Deli>I-ORG ,<Deli>O Russia<Deli>I-LOC 's<Deli>O biggest<Deli>O company<Deli>O by<Deli>O market<Deli>O capitalisation<Deli>O ,<Deli>O has<Deli>O massive<Deli>O reserves<Deli>O and<Deli>O potentially<Deli>O huge<Deli>O earnings<Deli>O .<Deli>O

Researchers<Deli>O report<Deli>O progress<Deli>O in<Deli>O muscular<Deli>O dystrophy<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
PHILADELPHIA<Deli>I-LOC 1996-08-29<Deli>O 
University<Deli>I-ORG of<Deli>I-ORG Pennsylvania<Deli>I-ORG researchers<Deli>O on<Deli>O Thursday<Deli>O said<Deli>O a<Deli>O new<Deli>O gene-therapy<Deli>O technique<Deli>O for<Deli>O treating<Deli>O muscular<Deli>O dystrophy<Deli>O disease<Deli>O had<Deli>O shown<Deli>O progress<Deli>O in<Deli>O laboratory<Deli>O animals<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Word<Deli>O of<Deli>O the<Deli>O findings<Deli>O ,<Deli>O to<Deli>O be<Deli>O published<Deli>O in<Deli>O the<Deli>O Oct.<Deli>O 1<Deli>O issue<Deli>O of<Deli>O the<Deli>O journal<Deli>O "<Deli>O Human<Deli>I-ORG Gene<Deli>I-ORG Therapy<Deli>I-ORG ,<Deli>O "<Deli>O came<Deli>O in<Deli>O advance<Deli>O of<Deli>O the<Deli>O annual<Deli>O Jerry<Deli>I-MISC Lewis<Deli>I-MISC Labour<Deli>I-MISC Day<Deli>I-MISC weekend<Deli>O telethon<Deli>O to<Deli>O raise<Deli>O money<Deli>O for<Deli>O muscular<Deli>O dystrophy<Deli>O research<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Several<Deli>O hurdles<Deli>O must<Deli>O be<Deli>O overcome<Deli>O before<Deli>O the<Deli>O method<Deli>O is<Deli>O used<Deli>O in<Deli>O human<Deli>O trials<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Nevertheless<Deli>O ,<Deli>O "<Deli>O a<Deli>O treatment<Deli>O based<Deli>O on<Deli>O the<Deli>O new<Deli>O strategy<Deli>O ....<Deli>O may<Deli>O have<Deli>O the<Deli>O potential<Deli>O to<Deli>O benefit<Deli>O many<Deli>O patients<Deli>O ,<Deli>O "<Deli>O the<Deli>O University<Deli>I-ORG of<Deli>I-ORG Pennsylvania<Deli>I-ORG Medical<Deli>O Centre<Deli>O said<Deli>O in<Deli>O a<Deli>O release<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Muscular<Deli>O dystrophy<Deli>O is<Deli>O a<Deli>O fatal<Deli>O illness<Deli>O in<Deli>O which<Deli>O the<Deli>O body<Deli>O 's<Deli>O muscle<Deli>O tissue<Deli>O degenerates<Deli>O and<Deli>O is<Deli>O replaced<Deli>O by<Deli>O fat<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Death<Deli>O strikes<Deli>O in<Deli>O early<Deli>O adulthood<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Individuals<Deli>O with<Deli>O the<Deli>O disease<Deli>O have<Deli>O a<Deli>O non-working<Deli>O version<Deli>O of<Deli>O a<Deli>O gene<Deli>O responsible<Deli>O for<Deli>O producing<Deli>O a<Deli>O crucial<Deli>O muscle<Deli>O protein<Deli>O called<Deli>O dystrophin<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
In<Deli>O the<Deli>O study<Deli>O at<Deli>O the<Deli>O University<Deli>O 's<Deli>O Institute<Deli>I-ORG for<Deli>I-ORG Human<Deli>I-ORG Gene<Deli>I-ORG Therapy<Deli>I-ORG ,<Deli>O researchers<Deli>O altered<Deli>O a<Deli>O common-cold<Deli>O virus<Deli>O to<Deli>O carry<Deli>O a<Deli>O version<Deli>O of<Deli>O the<Deli>O working<Deli>O dystrophin<Deli>O gene<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
The<Deli>O virus<Deli>O ,<Deli>O which<Deli>O also<Deli>O was<Deli>O altered<Deli>O to<Deli>O minimise<Deli>O its<Deli>O susceptibility<Deli>O to<Deli>O the<Deli>O immune<Deli>O system<Deli>O ,<Deli>O was<Deli>O then<Deli>O injected<Deli>O into<Deli>O the<Deli>O muscle<Deli>O cells<Deli>O of<Deli>O mice<Deli>O bred<Deli>O to<Deli>O lack<Deli>O dystrophin<Deli>O genes<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
In<Deli>O the<Deli>O experiment<Deli>O ,<Deli>O between<Deli>O 30<Deli>O to<Deli>O 40<Deli>O percent<Deli>O of<Deli>O the<Deli>O muscle<Deli>O fibers<Deli>O in<Deli>O one<Deli>O group<Deli>O of<Deli>O mice<Deli>O produced<Deli>O dystrophin<Deli>O for<Deli>O two<Deli>O weeks<Deli>O before<Deli>O diminishing<Deli>O .<Deli>O

Tsang<Deli>I-PER ,<Deli>O who<Deli>O made<Deli>O the<Deli>O remarks<Deli>O during<Deli>O a<Deli>O visit<Deli>O to<Deli>O New<Deli>I-LOC Zealand<Deli>I-LOC ,<Deli>O also<Deli>O spoke<Deli>O strongly<Deli>O in<Deli>O favour<Deli>O of<Deli>O keeping<Deli>O the<Deli>O Hong<Deli>I-LOC Kong<Deli>I-LOC dollar<Deli>O pegged<Deli>O to<Deli>O its<Deli>O U.S.<Deli>I-LOC counterpart<Deli>O ,<Deli>O and<Deli>O said<Deli>O negotiations<Deli>O with<Deli>O China<Deli>I-LOC on<Deli>O next<Deli>O year<Deli>O 's<Deli>O budget<Deli>O were<Deli>O going<Deli>O smoothly<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Hong<Deli>I-LOC Kong<Deli>I-LOC 's<Deli>O economy<Deli>O grew<Deli>O by<Deli>O only<Deli>O 3.1<Deli>O percent<Deli>O in<Deli>O the<Deli>O first<Deli>O quarter<Deli>O ,<Deli>O down<Deli>O from<Deli>O 5.9<Deli>O percent<Deli>O a<Deli>O year<Deli>O earlier<Deli>O ,<Deli>O and<Deli>O some<Deli>O private<Deli>O sector<Deli>O economists<Deli>O have<Deli>O revised<Deli>O downwards<Deli>O their<Deli>O predictions<Deli>O for<Deli>O the<Deli>O 1996<Deli>O year<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Second<Deli>O quarter<Deli>O growth<Deli>O estimates<Deli>O will<Deli>O be<Deli>O released<Deli>O when<Deli>O the<Deli>O Hong<Deli>I-LOC Kong<Deli>I-LOC government<Deli>O issues<Deli>O its<Deli>O half-yearly<Deli>O economic<Deli>O report<Deli>O on<Deli>O Friday<Deli>O .<Deli>O

He<Deli>O said<Deli>O inflation<Deli>O was<Deli>O under<Deli>O control<Deli>O and<Deli>O the<Deli>O Hong<Deli>I-LOC Kong<Deli>I-LOC dollar<Deli>O was<Deli>O "<Deli>O rock<Deli>O solid<Deli>O "<Deli>O .<Deli>O

"<Deli>O There<Deli>O 's<Deli>O absolutely<Deli>O no<Deli>O economic<Deli>O or<Deli>O financial<Deli>O or<Deli>O political<Deli>O reason<Deli>O for<Deli>O us<Deli>O to<Deli>O change<Deli>O .<Deli>O

TAIPEI<Deli>I-LOC 1996-08-29<Deli>O 
The<Deli>O Taiwan<Deli>I-LOC dollar<Deli>O closed<Deli>O slightly<Deli>O firmer<Deli>O on<Deli>O Thursday<Deli>O amid<Deli>O tight<Deli>O Taiwan<Deli>I-LOC dollar<Deli>O liquidity<Deli>O in<Deli>O the<Deli>O banking<Deli>O system<Deli>O ,<Deli>O and<Deli>O dealers<Deli>O said<Deli>O the<Deli>O rate<Deli>O was<Deli>O likely<Deli>O to<Deli>O move<Deli>O narrowly<Deli>O in<Deli>O the<Deli>O near<Deli>O term<Deli>O .<Deli>O

JAKARTA<Deli>I-LOC 1996-08-29<Deli>O 
Indonesia<Deli>I-LOC sought<Deli>O on<Deli>O Thursday<Deli>O to<Deli>O play<Deli>O down<Deli>O a<Deli>O fire<Deli>O bomb<Deli>O attack<Deli>O on<Deli>O a<Deli>O U.S.<Deli>I-LOC consulate<Deli>O earlier<Deli>O this<Deli>O week<Deli>O ,<Deli>O saying<Deli>O it<Deli>O was<Deli>O being<Deli>O treated<Deli>O as<Deli>O a<Deli>O criminal<Deli>O rather<Deli>O than<Deli>O a<Deli>O political<Deli>O act<Deli>O ,<Deli>O the<Deli>O official<Deli>O Antara<Deli>I-LOC news<Deli>O agency<Deli>O said<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
The<Deli>O police<Deli>O are<Deli>O still<Deli>O investigating<Deli>O the<Deli>O incident<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
It<Deli>O is<Deli>O evident<Deli>O the<Deli>O happening<Deli>O is<Deli>O not<Deli>O politically<Deli>O motivated<Deli>O but<Deli>O just<Deli>O an<Deli>O ordinary<Deli>O criminal<Deli>O act<Deli>O ,<Deli>O the<Deli>O news<Deli>O agency<Deli>O quoted<Deli>O East<Deli>I-MISC Java<Deli>I-MISC military<Deli>O commander<Deli>O Major-General<Deli>O Utomo<Deli>I-PER as<Deli>O saying<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
The<Deli>O Tuesday<Deli>O morning<Deli>O attack<Deli>O on<Deli>O the<Deli>O consulate<Deli>O in<Deli>O Indonesias<Deli>I-MISC second<Deli>O largest<Deli>O city<Deli>O of<Deli>O Surabaya<Deli>I-LOC ,<Deli>O caused<Deli>O slight<Deli>O damage<Deli>O to<Deli>O a<Deli>O guard<Deli>O house<Deli>O before<Deli>O being<Deli>O quickly<Deli>O extinguished<Deli>O ,<Deli>O a<Deli>O spokesman<Deli>O at<Deli>O the<Deli>O U.S.<Deli>I-LOC embassy<Deli>O in<Deli>O Jakarta<Deli>I-LOC ,<Deli>O 700<Deli>O km<Deli>O (<Deli>O 430<Deli>O miles<Deli>O )<Deli>O west<Deli>O of<Deli>O Surabaya<Deli>I-LOC ,<Deli>O said<Deli>O on<Deli>O Wednesday<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
No<Deli>O one<Deli>O was<Deli>O injures<Deli>O ,<Deli>O he<Deli>O said<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Nobody<Deli>O should<Deli>O try<Deli>O and<Deli>O exaggerate<Deli>O it<Deli>O by<Deli>O calling<Deli>O it<Deli>O a<Deli>O bomb<Deli>O because<Deli>O it<Deli>O was<Deli>O just<Deli>O a<Deli>O molotov<Deli>O cocktail<Deli>O ,<Deli>O Utomo<Deli>I-PER said<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
He<Deli>O said<Deli>O police<Deli>O were<Deli>O investigating<Deli>O the<Deli>O incident<Deli>O and<Deli>O patrols<Deli>O around<Deli>O diplomatic<Deli>O offices<Deli>O in<Deli>O Surabaya<Deli>I-LOC would<Deli>O be<Deli>O stepped<Deli>O up<Deli>O .<Deli>O

HONG<Deli>I-LOC KONG<Deli>I-LOC 1996-08-29<Deli>O 
Senior<Deli>O Hong<Deli>I-LOC Kong<Deli>I-LOC civil<Deli>O servants<Deli>O were<Deli>O given<Deli>O the<Deli>O go-ahead<Deli>O on<Deli>O Thursday<Deli>O to<Deli>O challenge<Deli>O a<Deli>O government<Deli>O ban<Deli>O on<Deli>O them<Deli>O standing<Deli>O for<Deli>O the<Deli>O Beijing-backed<Deli>I-MISC panel<Deli>O to<Deli>O choose<Deli>O the<Deli>O territory<Deli>O 's<Deli>O first<Deli>O post-handover<Deli>O leader<Deli>O and<Deli>O lawmakers<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
The<Deli>O Supreme<Deli>I-ORG Court<Deli>I-ORG ruled<Deli>O that<Deli>O a<Deli>O judicial<Deli>O hearing<Deli>O contesting<Deli>O the<Deli>O ban<Deli>O would<Deli>O be<Deli>O heard<Deli>O on<Deli>O September<Deli>O 11<Deli>O ,<Deli>O three<Deli>O days<Deli>O before<Deli>O the<Deli>O nomination<Deli>O period<Deli>O for<Deli>O the<Deli>O Selection<Deli>I-ORG Committee<Deli>I-ORG closes<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
The<Deli>O government<Deli>O maintains<Deli>O the<Deli>O ban<Deli>O ,<Deli>O announced<Deli>O earlier<Deli>O this<Deli>O month<Deli>O ,<Deli>O is<Deli>O necessary<Deli>O to<Deli>O avoid<Deli>O a<Deli>O possible<Deli>O conflict<Deli>O of<Deli>O interest<Deli>O because<Deli>O civil<Deli>O servants<Deli>O are<Deli>O involved<Deli>O in<Deli>O determining<Deli>O government<Deli>O policy<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Civil<Deli>O servants<Deli>O argue<Deli>O the<Deli>O ban<Deli>O stymies<Deli>O their<Deli>O political<Deli>O rights<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
The<Deli>O 400-strong<Deli>O Selection<Deli>I-ORG Committee<Deli>I-ORG will<Deli>O select<Deli>O Hong<Deli>I-LOC Kong<Deli>I-LOC 's<Deli>O future<Deli>O chief<Deli>O executive<Deli>O to<Deli>O replace<Deli>O the<Deli>O British<Deli>I-MISC governor<Deli>O and<Deli>O a<Deli>O provisional<Deli>O legislature<Deli>O to<Deli>O take<Deli>O over<Deli>O from<Deli>O the<Deli>O elected<Deli>O chamber<Deli>O which<Deli>O Beijing<Deli>I-LOC plans<Deli>O to<Deli>O dissolve<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Hong<Deli>I-LOC Kong<Deli>I-LOC ,<Deli>O a<Deli>O British<Deli>I-MISC colony<Deli>O for<Deli>O more<Deli>O than<Deli>O 150<Deli>O years<Deli>O ,<Deli>O will<Deli>O be<Deli>O handed<Deli>O back<Deli>O to<Deli>O China<Deli>I-LOC at<Deli>O midnight<Deli>O on<Deli>O June<Deli>O 30<Deli>O next<Deli>O year<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
China<Deli>I-LOC intends<Deli>O to<Deli>O dismantle<Deli>O the<Deli>O territory<Deli>O 's<Deli>O first<Deli>O fully-elected<Deli>O legislature<Deli>O because<Deli>O it<Deli>O opposes<Deli>O Britain<Deli>I-LOC 's<Deli>O recent<Deli>O electoral<Deli>O reforms<Deli>O and<Deli>O install<Deli>O an<Deli>O interim<Deli>O appointed<Deli>O chamber<Deli>O ,<Deli>O a<Deli>O decision<Deli>O that<Deli>O has<Deli>O generated<Deli>O considerable<Deli>O controversy<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
The<Deli>O judicial<Deli>O review<Deli>O sought<Deli>O by<Deli>O directorate-grade<Deli>O bureaucrats<Deli>O will<Deli>O apply<Deli>O to<Deli>O only<Deli>O about<Deli>O 1,000<Deli>O of<Deli>O the<Deli>O approximately<Deli>O 33,000<Deli>O civil<Deli>O servants<Deli>O affected<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
Police<Deli>O unions<Deli>O are<Deli>O not<Deli>O contesting<Deli>O the<Deli>O ban<Deli>O ,<Deli>O which<Deli>O affects<Deli>O all<Deli>O 27,000<Deli>O officers<Deli>O ,<Deli>O and<Deli>O nor<Deli>O are<Deli>O the<Deli>O very<Deli>O top<Deli>O tier<Deli>O of<Deli>O Hong<Deli>I-LOC Kong<Deli>I-LOC 's<Deli>O mandarin<Deli>O class<Deli>O ,<Deli>O the<Deli>O policy<Deli>O secretaries<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
More<Deli>O than<Deli>O 16,000<Deli>O application<Deli>O forms<Deli>O for<Deli>O places<Deli>O on<Deli>O the<Deli>O Selection<Deli>I-ORG Committee<Deli>I-ORG have<Deli>O been<Deli>O handed<Deli>O out<Deli>O since<Deli>O the<Deli>O nomination<Deli>O period<Deli>O opened<Deli>O .<Deli>O

Singapore<Deli>I-ORG Refining<Deli>I-ORG Company<Deli>I-ORG (<Deli>O SRC<Deli>I-ORG )<Deli>O is<Deli>O expected<Deli>O to<Deli>O shutdown<Deli>O its<Deli>O 60,000<Deli>O barrel-per-day<Deli>O (<Deli>O bpd<Deli>O )<Deli>O crude<Deli>O distillation<Deli>O unit<Deli>O (<Deli>O CDU<Deli>I-ORG )<Deli>O in<Deli>O September<Deli>O ,<Deli>O an<Deli>O industry<Deli>O source<Deli>O said<Deli>O on<Deli>O Thursday<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
"<Deli>O They<Deli>O think<Deli>O something<Deli>O is<Deli>O stuck<Deli>O ,<Deli>O "<Deli>O the<Deli>O source<Deli>O said<Deli>O .<Deli>O "<Deli>O 
But<Deli>O nothing<Deli>O has<Deli>O been<Deli>O decided<Deli>O as<Deli>O they<Deli>O are<Deli>O still<Deli>O waiting<Deli>O for<Deli>O an<Deli>O X-ray<Deli>O machine<Deli>O to<Deli>O determine<Deli>O the<Deli>O problem<Deli>O .<Deli>O "<Deli>O 
The<Deli>O source<Deli>O said<Deli>O the<Deli>O problem<Deli>O was<Deli>O discovered<Deli>O during<Deli>O the<Deli>O past<Deli>O month<Deli>O during<Deli>O which<Deli>O time<Deli>O CDU<Deli>I-ORG No.3<Deli>I-ORG 's<Deli>O production<Deli>O has<Deli>O varied<Deli>O from<Deli>O maximum<Deli>O capacity<Deli>O of<Deli>O 60,000<Deli>O bpd<Deli>O to<Deli>O as<Deli>O low<Deli>O as<Deli>O 40,000<Deli>O bpd<Deli>O ,<Deli>O depending<Deli>O on<Deli>O the<Deli>O crude<Deli>O being<Deli>O run<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
"<Deli>O We<Deli>O are<Deli>O having<Deli>O a<Deli>O lot<Deli>O of<Deli>O problems<Deli>O ,<Deli>O "<Deli>O said<Deli>O a<Deli>O source<Deli>O .<Deli>O 
An<Deli>O earlier<Deli>O problem<Deli>O with<Deli>O CDU<Deli>I-ORG No<Deli>I-ORG .<Deli>I-ORG 
3<Deli>I-ORG arose<Deli>O on<Deli>O July<Deli>O 24<Deli>O when<Deli>O an<Deli>O industry<Deli>O source<Deli>O said<Deli>O the<Deli>O CDU<Deli>I-ORG would<Deli>O be<Deli>O closed<Deli>O down<Deli>O briefly<Deli>O in<Deli>O August<Deli>O for<Deli>O repairs<Deli>O to<Deli>O a<Deli>O heat<Deli>O exchanger<Deli>O .<Deli>O
